name: Baked beetroot
description: The Philips Airfryer makes an excellent job of cooking root vegetables. Glazed carrots or baked parsnips are done in no time. Or baked beetroot that, like celeriac, develops its pleasantly sweet taste even better when baked, is cooked quickly and easily in the Airfryer.
author: jana.leutwyler@philips.com

steps.description: For two people, slice 400 g of beetroot and bake for 15-20 minutes at 180°.

Cut two oranges into segments, saving the juice. Mix the juice it with 2 tbsp olive oil, 1 tsp honey, salt and pepper. Serve the orange segments with the warm beetroot slices and drizzle with the dressing.
Now just sprinkle with the leaves of 2 twigs of fresh thyme and 80g of crumbled feta and you have an appetising light lunch rich in vitamins.

name: Crispy Fish Roll
description: Recipe by Guido Weber
author: kathrin.olipitz_1@philips.com

steps.description: Cut the carrots into small cubes. Cut the chard into strips without the stalk. Then, blanch both for 2 min.
Sauté the blanched carrots with the shallots in a pan with sugar and add the chard. Add a little salt to taste and let cool.
In the meantime, wash the fish filet, pat dry and finely chop it. Then, season the fish with salt, pepper, and lemon juice, add the vegetables and mix thoroughly.
Spread out the strudel pastry sheets on your work surface. Place the marinated fish in a line in the center of the sheets.
Lightly brush the edges of the pastry with egg white. Taking the pastry sheets from the left or right, tightly roll them up and brush with olive oil.
Bake the fish rolls in the Airfryer at the indicated time and temperature in two batches.
Peel the potatoes and cut them into long, 9 mm thick French fries (you can use a French fries cutter for this).
Soak the fries in water for at least 30 minutes.  Drain them thoroughly, then pat them dry with kitchen paper.

Put the fries in a large bowl, drizzle with the oil and toss to coat them. Transfer them to the Airfryer basket.  Slide the basket into the Airfryer.  Start the device with the indicated time and temperature.
Slide out the basket  and shake the fries.  Start the device with the indicated time and temperature. Shake inbetween once again.
Sprinkle with salt and serve on a platter.

name: Roasted pumpkin mash
description:
Pumpkin puree is used in many recipes such as pies, cakes and bread. Here is how you can easily prepare the puree in the Airfryer. You can serve the puree as a side dish to your meal.

Tip: You can also combine the puree with potatoes, by roasting an even amount together with the pumpkin.
author: wouter.veldman_1@philips.com

steps.description: Cut the pumpkin flesh into 2 cm cubes. You can also use the skin. Mix the pumpkin in a bowl with the ground coriander, fennel seeds and olive oil.
Roast the pumpkin cubes in the basket of the Airfryer at the indicated temperature and time until the pumpkin is fully done.

Mash the pumpkin with sea salt and pepper.

Tip: Use a potato masher for a coarse puree, or a food processor for a smooth puree.

name: Chocolate Banana Calzone
description: Tip: A scoop of vanilla ice cream pairs perfectly with the chocolate banana calzone.
author: mirta.stipanicev@philips.com

steps.description: For the chocolate banana calzone, first roll out pizza dough and cut out four circles of about 6 inches in diameter. In the middle, spread out 1 tablespoon of hazelnut sauce, stopping about 0.4 inches from the edge.
Peel the bananas and cut them into thin slices. Lay the slices on top of the nougat cream. Finely chop the hazelnuts an sprinkle over the banana slices.
Fold the dough circles in half and press the edges together firmly. Bake them in the Airfryer at the indicated temperature and time. For optimum results, bake in several batches.
Beat the whipping cream until it is stiff, serve it with the chocolate banana calzone.
Wash the pumpkin thoroughly and cut away both ends. Afterwards cut the pumpkin in halves and remove the core.
Put the pumpkin halve with the cut surface into the Airfryer basket and roast it with the time and temperature indicated below.
When the pumpkin is ready turn it to flavour with rosemary, salt and if you like it hot, with chili powder.
Put the oven cheese in the hole of the pumpkin and roast it with the time and temperature indicated below.
Serve your pumpkin ovencheese gratin halves coated with parsley and pumpkin seeds. Baste the dish with the pumpkin seed oil.

name: Scrambled Eggs with Tarragon and Feta
description:
Turns out, scrambled eggs IS something people search for in the app. Maybe you do not need an Airfryer to make them, but we gave it a try anyway, what do you think? How would you prepare it in the Airfryer?

Tip: Use the baking accessory for this recipe.
author: mirta.stipanicev@philips.com

steps.description: Cut the Feta into small cubes. Finely chop the tarragon leafs.
Whisk the eggs in a bowl, add them to the baking accessory and start the device at the indicated temperature and time.

Give the eggs a good stir with a wooden or silicon spatula. Close the Airfryer and continue to heat up the eggs. 

Tip: Depending on the starting temperature and size of the eggs, you might have to adjust the time. 
In the end your eggs need to be fully cooked before they are ready.
Add the Feta and tarragon, stir through the eggs. Heat one more time at the indicated time and temperature to melt the cheese a bit.
Season with cayenne pepper and serve on toasted bread.

name: Roasted carrots with crumbled goat cheese
description: Vegetables are so much easier to like, when you fry them in the Airfryer, their natural sweetness will come to live.
author: wouter.veldman_1@philips.com

steps.description:
Cut the greens from the carrot, keep part of it for a nice visual effect. 
Brush them with olive oil. 

Tip: Cut the carrots in any shape you like. You can peel them or clean them thoroughly. 

Tip: You can use the rest of the carrot green in a green smoothie or feed to your Rabbit.
Roast the carrots the basket of the Airfryer at the indicated temperature and time.
Meanwhile, crumble the goat cheese and finely chop the parsley.
Serve the roasted carrots, sprinkled with crumbled goat cheese and parsley.

name: Airfryer Fish tikka masala
description:
A Tandoori style recipe with yoghurt-based marinade has a refreshing kick to it.

Tip: Serve this fish tikka masala with rice or in pita bread.
author: wouter.veldman_1@philips.com

steps.description: Peel and finely chop the garlic and ginger. Mix them in a bowl with the lemon juice, olive oil, yoghurt, garam masala, paprika powder, chili powder, turmeric and salt. Cut the fish in 2 pieces per portion and place into the marinade. Leave to marinate for 20 minutes.
Meanwhile, cut the zucchini into rings. Halve the bell pepper, remove the stalk and seeds and cut into 3cm pieces. Place into a bowl with the olive oil and toss to coat the vegetable with oil.
Place the zucchini and bell pepper into the Airfryer basket and start the indicated temperature and time.
Place the marinated fish into the Airfryer basket and start the indicated temperature and time.
Meanwhile chop the coriander coarsely and cut the lemon in wedges. Serve the fish tikka masala with the grilled vegetables, fresh coriander and lemon on the side.

name: Springrolls with minced beef and honey-soy-sauce
description: An asian snack with lots of vegetables and only one tablespoon of oil.
author: guido.weber@philips.com

steps.description: Cut the carrots, snow peas, the cabbage and the spring onions in fine stripes. Chop the coriander and mix with the bean sprouts and the remaining vegetables in a bowl
Now process the salt, pepper, chili powder, brown sugar, the cinnamon and the garlic cloves to a paste in a mortar.
Separate the egg. Mix the egg-yolk with the vegetables, the spiced paste and the minced beef very well. Keep the egg-white besides.
Take one springroll pastry plate and place 10 cm wide and 2-3 centimeters thik of the filling in the middle of it. Now fold the pastry sides to the middle, so the filling won't fall out.
Brush the sides with the egg-white and roll the springrolls firmly. Now brush them with some oil.
Put the springrolls in the Airffyer, close it and bake the springrolls at the indicated time and temperature settings.
Meanwhile mix the honey and the soyy sauce in a small pan and stir it at medium heat until a thick sauce is formed.

name: Japanese cheesecake
description:
Easy to make, tasty, and super fluffy. We think that this dessert has it all. 
Tip: For a fresh citrus note add some grated orange and lemon zest in the batter.
author: vedran.boskovic@philips.com

steps.description: Heat the milk in a pot over low heat. Melt the cream cheese and butter in the milk. Using a whisk, mix all ingredients well. Separate the egg yolks from the egg whites. Add the yolks to the cream cheese mixture together with the lemon juice and salt.  Whisk again to combine well.

Add the cake flour and corn starch to the cream cheese mixture and mix everything with a hand mixer. In a separate bowl, mix together the sugar and egg whites with a hand mixer until soft peaks start to show. Using a spatula, mix together the whipped egg whites with the cream cheese dough. Mix well. Transfer everything into a baking accessory greased with a little bit of butter.
Bake at the indicated temperature for the recommended time.
Leave the Japanese cheesecake in the Airfryer to rest for an additional 10 minutes after baking. Serve warm.

name: Roasted cherry tomatoes
description: Tip: Serve with stuffed courgettes.
author: nikola.kulmitzer@philips.com

steps.description: Place cherry tomatoes on the vine in the basket and roast them in the Airfryer.  Slide the basket into the Airfryer. Start the device with the indicated time and temperature.
Serve your roasted cherry tomatoes!

name: Spring chicken and vegetable casserole
description: A spring casserole recipe filled with fresh vegetables, lean chicken meat and cheese. A delicious and easy way of adding more vitamin filled vegetables to your diet.
author: darko.kontin@infinum.hr

steps.description: Cook the chicken breast in boiling water for 15 minutes. Cool the chicken slightly after cooking and then cut it into 2 centimeter cubes. Wash the zucchini and spring onion. Then dice them in the same size as the chicken. Combine all three ingredients into a bowl.
Peel the carrot and dice it in a small pieces. Add the peas and finely diced carrot to the bowl. Grate the Gouda cheese and add it to the bowl as well. Mix all the ingredients.
In a separate smaller bowl, combine the egg, sour cream, chives, salt, and pepper. Whisk all the ingredients with a fork until combined.
Transfer the chicken and vegetable mixture to the Philips Airfryer baking accessory. Pour the egg and sour cream topping over the meat and vegetables.
Put the baking accessory into the basket of the Airfryer and bake at the indicated temperature and time until the casserole has turned golden on top.
Leave the casserole for a couple of minutes to set before serving.

name: Sweet potato brownies
description: Have you ever tried to make a brownie where no extra sugar is added? Well try this! The sweet potato and dates provide a natural source of sugar. All quick and easily made in the Airfryer.
author: luc.swaan@philips.com

steps.description: Wash the sweet potatoes and cut them into 2x2 cm pieces. Place the sweet potatoes in the basket and roast at the indicated time and temperature.

Cut the dates over the length in and remove the core. Peel the sweet potatoes and cut into small pieces.  Mix the dates in the food processor with the sweet potato pieces and salt to a smooth batter. Grate the yellow rind of the lemon and press out the juice over the mashed potatoes. Add a little lemon zest to the mashed potatoes and mix well.

Chop the pistachio nuts coarsely. Chop the chocolate. Mix the flour in a bowl with the cocoa and baking powder and stir in the mashed potato. Add an egg, mix to a smooth batter. Add the nuts and the chocolate in the batter.

Grease the Philips baking accessory with butter and dust with flour. Divide the batter evenly over the baking accessory. Bake the brownie at the indicated time and temperature. To check if the brownie is baked, use a wooden skewer.
Dust the brownie with cocoa powder and cut into 12 equal pieces.

name: Colorful skewers with potato twisters
description:
Let's make skewers in your Airfryer, such as satay, classic shaslick or this variation with steak and sausages. 

Tip: Paprika powder, curry or dried herbs also make a tasty topping for the potato twisters.

Additional needed: 8 wooden skewers, 2 mm spiral blade.
author: sandra.pilkes@philips.com

steps.description: Cut the steak in equal pieces and marinate in a bowl with olive oil, salt and pepper. Remove the stem and seeds from the bell peppers and cut into equal pieces. Peel the onion and cut into parts. Pour the cocktail sausages and drain in a colander.
Add the bell pepper, steak, onion and cocktail sausages to the skewers and place the skewers into the basket of the Airfryer. Fry the skewers at the indicated temperature and time.

For the potato twisters use a 2 mm spiral blade, sold at cooking shops. Wash the potatoes and dry well. Place the blade on the potato and turn to spiral the potato. Place the potato spirals on skewers. Brush the potatoes with some olive oil and sprinkle with salt.
Place the skewers into the basket of the Airfryer. Fry the potato twisters golden and crisp on the indicated temperature and time.

name: Eggplant with Hokkaido Pumpkin Purée
description: Recipe by Guido Weber
author: kathrin.olipitz_1@philips.com

steps.description: Wash the eggplant and cut into slices lengthwise. Brush the slices with a little olive oil, put them in the Airfryer, and brown them at the indicated time and temperature.
Roast the pine nuts in a pan without any butter or oil until they get some color.

In the meantime, peel and seed the Hokkaido pumpkin and cut it into small cubes. Drizzle them with olive oil, sprinkle with confectioner's sugar, salt, and the chopped thyme. Place in the basket of the Airfryer.
Braise at the indicated time and temperature.
Heat the broth and cream.
Put the pumpkin in a bowl and puree with the broth and cream, add the Parmesan cheese.
Now, mix in the roasted pine nuts and season with salt, pepper, and nutmeg to taste.
Lay out the eggplant slices, then add the squash mixture in layers, like a lasagna.
Tip: If you want to bake the lasagna, layer it in the baking accessory and pour tomato sauce over, add the cheese, and bake for 5 min. at 180°C.

name: Apple strudel with raisins and almonds
description:
The recipe is made with homemade dough, to speed up the process, you could use ready-made pastry.

Tip: You can soak the raisins in some rum for a nice kick.
author: wouter.veldman_1@philips.com

steps.description:
Mix the flour with salt, egg, oil and water. Leave the dough to rest for 30 minutes in a warm place, dusted with flour, wrapped in baking paper.

Tip: You can use the Airfryer as a hot chamber, after heating it up for 1 minute at 120 degrees.
Meanwhile finely chop the apple and almonds. Mix the pieces with lemon juice, raisins, sugar and cinnamon.

Use a clean kitchen towel and dust the towel with flour. On the towel, roll out the dough to create a 35x50 cm sheet. 
Tip: You might not reach the edges; step 4/5 will help you.
Melt the butter in a heat resistant cup in the basket of the Airfryer at the indicated temperature and time.
Brush the dough with the melted butter. After brushing, the dough can be stretched easier to create the 35x50 cm sheet.
Mix the egg yolk with milk. Brush the edges of the pastry with the egg mixture.

Spread the apple mixture on top of the pastry, apart from the edges.
First flap the sides, the roll up the dough.
Brush the top with the egg mixture.
Place the strudel into the baking accessory and bake it at the indicated temperature and time.
Serve pieces, dusted with powdered sugar

name: Breakfast eggs and asparagus tortilla
description: These delicious asparagus tortillas feature fluffy scrambled eggs with cream cheese and some tomato and ham. Easy enough to make and extra tasty. Try them!
author: vedran.boskovic@philips.com

steps.description: Crack the eggs in a medium-sized bowl and whisk them. Heat the olive oil in a pan, pour in the egg mixture, and stir it while frying.
Remove the hard part of the asparagus. Bring water to a boil, add the asparagus tips, and blanch them for a few minutes. Cut the asparagus lengthwise.

Wash the tomato and cut it into 1 x 1 cm cubes.
Cut the ham into 1 x 1 cm cubes as well. Mix the tomato and ham.

Take a tortilla and make a slit from one edge to the middle. Place the fillings on each quarter of the tortilla starting with scrambled eggs on the bottom left one. Add the tomato and ham mix to the upper left quadrant and the asparagus cut lengthwise to the upper right one. Finish with cream cheese in the bottom right quadrant. Sprinkle a pinch of salt over the fillings.
Fold the first quarter over the second one. Fold the second quarter over the third quarter. Finish off by folding the last quarter so you have a triangle.
Put two folded tortillas into the Airfryer basket and start the device with the indicated time and temperature. Repeat the step once more to bake the second batch of tortillas.
Let the tortilla cool down for one minute, then cut it in half and serve.

name: Coq au vin
description: Recipe by Guido Weber. Tip: Instead of red wine, you can also use white wine or, as a non-alcoholic alternative, apple juice diluted with a little water.
author: nikola.kulmitzer@philips.com

steps.description: Combine about 2/3 of the vegetables together with 100 ml of red wine and chicken broth in a bowl. Put the spices, the peeled and pressed clove of garlic, and the lemon peel in a tea bag or tea infuser, then close it securely, add it to the mixture and let it stand.
Render the bacon in the baking accessory at the indicated time and temperature.
Next, add the rest of the vegetables to the baking pan and sauté at the indicated time and temperature.
Then, deglaze with the rest of the red wine and cook a little more.
Now add the rest of the vegetables with the wine and the broth.

Wash the chicken, pat it dry, cut it into rough pieces, add salt and pepper, and lay it in the red wine broth. Stew in the baking accessory at the indicated time and temperature. Turn the chicken during stewing.

Boil and mash peas and potatoes. Boil and finely chop the spinach and the chili. Mix all the ingredients with the masalas. Add salt to taste. Divide the ingredients into 6 equal balls. Press each ball between your palms to give them a tikki shape. Finally, press some peanuts into the dough.
Brush the tikkis with oil and place  in the basket.  Slide the basket into the Airfryer. Start the device with the time and temperature indicated below.
Serve hot with chutney.

name: Meatballs with potatoes and vegetables
description: The Airfryer is also suitable for preparing entire meals. Because you cook everything using hot air, your Airfryer can cook meat at the same time as your potatoes and vegetables – all in one Airfryer. This makes cooking a lot easier!
author: luc.swaan@philips.com

steps.description:
Peel the carrots and cut into 1 centimeter cubes. Mix the chopped vegetables together with a little oil.

Tip: The carrots will stay nice and crunchy. If this isn't how you like them, then you can pre-cook them for 2 minutes on the stove. If you do want them crunchy, you can put the carrots to one side for now.
Finely chop the onion. Put the ground meat in a bowl and add the egg, breadcrumbs and chopped onion and season to taste with salt and pepper. Roll this into 8 meatballs of around 75 grams each.
Put the potatoes in the basket of your Airfryer and roast until semi-cooked according to the instructions below.
Place the carrot cubes next to the potatoes and spread the meatballs over the carrots. Cook everything according to the time and temperature indicated.
Turn the meatballs once and continue cooking according to the instructions.
Cut the potatoes into quarters and serve with the meatballs, the carrots and some chopped parsley.

name: Baked fresh Scallop
description: Spinach Bacon baked fresh Scallop
author: nikola.kulmitzer@philips.com

steps.description: Chop up the spinach leaves, then add in a little oil.
Transfer the spinach in the Philips baking accessory. Slide it into the Airfryer and start the device with the indicated time and temperature.
Add in chopped bacon and a little butter and start the device with the indicated time and temperature. Mix up well and put aside.
Wash scallops thoroughly. Spread the spinach bacon mash evenly around each scallop.
Sprinkle a little oil on each scallop, then cook in basket with the indicated settings. Garnish with black pepper.
Serve your Spinach Bacon Baked Fresh scallop.

name: Crispy salmon cubes
description: Tip: You can also prepare crispy fish cubes with other types of solid fish fillets.
author: kathrin.olipitz_1@philips.com

steps.description: First, crumble the cornflakes and, if necessary, remove the skin and bones from the salmon fillet.

Wash the fennel, cut it in half and remove the stalk. Then, cut it into thin strips or slices. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Mix in the rest of the lemon juice and olive oil and allow to marinate for approx. 10 minutes.

Cut the salmon fillet into approximately 3 x 3 cm cubes. Season with half of the lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Coat with the flour, beaten egg, and cornflakes. Bake in the Airfryer at the indicated temperature and time.
Serve the crispy salmon cubes with the fennel and drizzle with a little balsamic vinegar.

name: Nut and Seed Bread
description:
Tip: Prepare the dough the evening before. It takes a little time!

Tip: The Psyllium is great for digestion and makes the bread softer. It could be replaced by the same amount of ground rolled oats.

Tip: Store the bread in a paper bag.
author: mirta.stipanicev@philips.com

steps.description: Mix the rolled oats, sunflower seeds, crushed linseeds, almonds, walnuts, chia, psyllium seed powder and salt in a large bowl. In a small bowl, mix the agave syrup, coconut oil and water.
Add the coconut oil mixture to the large bowl with seeds and stir into a sticky dough. Place the dough into the Philips Airfryer baking accessory, cover with a cloth and refrigerate overnight.
Place the baking accessory in the Airfryer basket and start at the indicated temperature and time.
Remove the bread from the accessory, place in the Airfryer basket and start the indicated temperature and time.

name: Grilled dorade in Southeast Asian style
description:
The citrus flavours will infuse the fish and give it an amazing flavour. 

Thai basil and lime leafs will make this recipe even more refreshing, they can be found in Asian stores. You can however decide to only use lemongrass and fresh coriander. 

Tip: Best to use the grill bottom accessory for this recipe.

Tip: The usual size of the Dorade fits the XL or XXL Airfryer. Small Dorades might fit the compact version Airfryer. 2 Small ones would even fit the XXL.
author: wouter.veldman_1@philips.com

steps.description: Peel the garlic and scrape the skin from the ginger. Halve the chili and discard the seeds. Roughly chop the garlic, ginger and chili. Make a paste of these ingredients with a pestle and mortar or a kitchen machine. Add sea salt and sesame oil.
Cut the lemon grass in 4 cm pieces and cut these pieces lengthways. Slice the lime.
Score the skin of the dorade with a knife. Rub the inside and outside with the garlic paste.
Stuff the inside of the Dorade with lime leafs, ½ of the lime slices and pieces of lemongrass. Sprinkle sesame seeds on top.
Add the grill bottom to the basket, place the stuffed dorade in it and start the appliance at the indicated temperature and time.

Serve the fish with the rest of the lime and fresh coriander and basil leafs. 

Tip: Serve the dish with rice and vegetables to make a meal out of it.

name: Crayfish party
description:
Kräftskiva is a traditional summertime eating and drinking celebration in the Nordic countries. This recipe fits perfectly to this event.
Tip:  side dishes of tomato salad with blueberries, mushroom quiche
author: nikola.kulmitzer@philips.com

steps.description: First make the garlic butter by chopping the garlic, onion and herbs finely and beating them into the butter, allowing it to steep for at least 6 hours.

Now put a pan containing 6 litres of water on the flame and add salt, peppercorns, dill and sugar and allow this to boil thoroughly.
Cook the crayfish in 2 parts so that they are dead within around 4 minutes.
Put all of the crayfish back in the pan and allow them to steep in this crayfish bouillon which slowly cools.

Clean the crayfish and break them open slightly.
Coat the crayfish in the home-made garlic butter.
Cut the lemons in half and grill them in the Airfryer.
Now grill the crayfish with the butter in the Airfryer.
Serve nice and hot with the lemon.
Scrub the potato skins thoroughly until clean, then dry them with kitchen paper.
Place the potatoes in the basket of the Airfryer. Slide the basket into the Airfryer. Start the device with the indicated time and temperature.
In the meantime, finely chop the onion. Cut the salami and red pepper into bite-sized pieces. Boil the peas for a few minutes until done. Rinse them under cold water, then drain and set aside.
When the timer rings and the potatoes are done, set them aside until they are cool enough to handle. Slice the top off each potato. Gently scoop the fluffy insides into a bowl.

Mash the fluffy potato insides with the sour cream using a fork. Mix in the salami, pepper, peas and the fresh herbs, if using. Season with pepper & salt.  Fill the baked potatoes with the mixture and serve immediately.

name: Pita bread with homemade tuna salad with lime
author: feline.van.hout@philips.com

steps.description: Boil ample water in a pan with a lid for the carrot. Remove the leaves from the carrot but leave a little bit of green at the top. Cut any large carrots into quarters lengthwise and cut the smaller ones in half. Cook the carrots in the pan with boiling water for 5 minutes, covered with the lid. Then drain.

Finely mince the red onion. Remove the seeds from the red chili pepper and finely chop the pepper. Thoroughly wash the lime. Grate the peel with a fine grater and juice the lime. Drain the tuna. Roughly chop the hazelnuts.
Roast the carrots and half of the red onion in the Airfryer. Mix them with the olive oil, salt and pepper and roast it in the Airfryer.
After step 3 sprinkle the carrots with the hazelnuts and bake them in the Airfryer.

Sprinkle the pita bread with a splash of water. Make a small cut in the side so you can open it and stuff with the tuna mixture. Add the stuffed pitas to the Airfryer and place them on top of the carrot and bake them in the Airfryer.
In a bowl, mix the red pepper, tuna and coconut zest with the lime zest, lime juice and the remaining red onion and mayonnaise. Season with salt and pepper.
Serve the stuffed pitas with the carrots. Garnish with the remaining lime zest.
Put beaten eggs, flour, and breadcrumbs into three separate bowls.  Season the breadcrumbs with salt, black pepper, and olive oil.
Mix the breadcrumbs and olive oil well.
Place the chicken tenders into the flour, then the eggs, and finally into the breadcrumbs.  Only coat 4-5 chicken tenders at a time.
Press chicken tenders down with some force to ensure even coating of the breadcrumbs.
Shake off any excess. Place on a sheet tray and set aside until all tenders have been breaded.

Open the Airfryer and put half the tenders into the basket. Don’t overfill. Set the time and temperature as indicated below. Shake the basket half way through the cooking process to ensure even cooking. Repeat the process until all chicken tenders are cooked.
Serve the chicken.

name: Savory spiced carrot cake
description:
This carrot cake contains ras-el-hanout, a fantastic North African spice mix. 

Tip: You could replace the ras-el-hanout with a mix of ground coriander and cumin seeds.
author: wouter.veldman_1@philips.com

steps.description: Cut the carrots in 2cm pieces and place in a large bowl. Add sunflower oil and toss to coat well.
Place the carrots in the basket of the Airfryer and roast the carrots at the indicated temperature and time. Shake the basket half way the cooking process.

With a food processor, grind the oats into a fine flour.
Add the roasted carrots, soy cream, ras-el-hanout, eggs, walnuts and salt and mix into a coarse mixture.
Coat the baking accessory with some oil and pour in the carrot mixture. Place the accessory in the basket of the Airfryer and start the device at the indicated temperature and time.

Meanwhile prepare the salad. Mix lemon juice, olive oil, sea salt and freshly ground pepper into a salad dressing. Roughly chop the fresh coriander. Mix the dressing with the lettuce and coriander just before serving it with the carrot cake and sprinkle with sesame seeds.

Peel the potatoes, cook and mash them with a potato masher. Moisten them with butter and season to taste with pepper, salt and nutmeg. Flatten the clove of garlic and chop it very finely. Place the mince in a large bowl and season to taste with salt and herb mix. Mix egg yolks with  cream and pour into the mince. Season to taste with freshly ground salt and pepper.

Shape the mince into 4 equal sized flat patties.
Drag the patties through the breadcrumbs so they have a crispy layer. Put the patties into the basket and slide the basket into the Aifryer. Bake the patties with the indicated time and temperature until they are almost done.
Remove them from the Airfryer and let the meat rest in a bowl, covered with aluminium foil.
Spray the mashed potato into attractive rosettes on the Philips grill pan accessory and cook them gratin style in the Airfryer.
In the meantime blanch the peas for some minutes in lightly salted boiling water.
Serve the potato rosettes with the meat patties and the peas and serve with redcurrant jelly. Place all of the ingredients on a plate and sprinkle a little melted butter over the peas.

name: Spiced glazed pineapple with cinnamon cream
description:
It will get a bit sticky, but it is worth it! 
Tip: Use the grill pan accessory for this recipe.
author: wouter.veldman_1@philips.com

steps.description: In a pan on the stove melt the butter. Add the sugar and let it dissolve. Add the cloves, black pepper and chili powder, carefully add the orange juice. Let the sauce simmer until it thickens into a syrup.
Meanwhile, peel the pineapple, cut lengthways into 12 pieces, discard the core.

Place the pineapple in the grill pan, brush with glaze and grill the fruit at the indicated temperature and time.
Repeat this step three times, until the fruit absorbed the glaze and is partly caramelized.

Mix the sour cream with the cinnamon. 
Tip: You can mix in a tsp. of glaze to sweeten the cream.

Serve the pineapple with a dollop of cream.

Tip: Possibly, the glaze will drop through the grill pan into the Airfryer pan. This could caramelise into solid pieces. Use it as a garnish to your dessert.

name: French Fries
description: Crispy homemade fries
author: verena.ratz@philips.com

steps.description: Peel the potatoes and cut lenthwise into fries. Place in cold water for 30 minutes.
Dry potatoes in the Airfryer for the recommended time and indicated temperature. Then place in a bowl and mix well with 1 tbsp oil.
Place the fries in the Airfryer basket and cook for the recommended time at the indicated temperature – and give them a good shake twice while cooking.

name: Glazed tofu balls
description: You can add flavour to tofu in many ways. Try this recipe or make your own creation and let us know how you would make them?
author: wouter.veldman_1@philips.com

steps.description:
Cut the tofu into cubes.
Roughly chop the spring onion, discard the ends.

Put the tofu and chopped spring onion in the bowl of a food processor with cashew, black garlic, Linseeds, vegetable stock powder, soy sauce, olive oil, pepper, turmeric, water and bread crumbs.
Process on high speed until the mixture clutters together like a dough.
Form balls with your hands.
Fry in the basket of the Airfryer at the indicated temperature and time.

Meanwhile heat rice vinegar, sesame oil, soya sauce, sugar and chili paste in a saucepan on the stove. Mix corn starch with cold water in a cup, pour into the pan. Heat while stirring until the sauce has thickened.

When the tofu balls are ready, add them to the glaze to coat them. Sprinkle with sesame seeds.

Tip: Serve the glazed tofu balls for example with rice and vegetables.

name: Stuffed cabbage rolls
description: With its delicate ruffled leaves and relatively subtle flavor, savoy cabbage is a good choice for baking cabbage rolls in a simple tomato sauce. This easy recipe can be made ahead of time and baked just before serving.
author: vedran.boskovic@philips.com

steps.description: Take 8 outer leaves of the savoy cabbage, wash them, and remove the stem using a knife. Blanch the savoy cabbage leaves for 5 minutes.
Add the walnuts to the Airfryer basket and bake them at the indicated temperature for the recommended time.

Drain the lentils and transfer them to a medium-sized bowl. Peel the carrot and shred it finely. Wash the yellow bell pepper and parsley. Dice the yellow bell pepper and finely chop the parsley. Dice the walnuts. Add everything to the bowl and mix in the spices (salt, black pepper, and curry powder).
Place 2 tablespoons of the mixture in the center of the savoy cabbage leaf. Fold the sides and roll it up.

Peel the onion and slice it into very thin slices. Add the diced tomato to the baking accessory, mix in the onions, and season with salt and sugar.  Add the savoy cabbage rolls to the baking accessory. Drizzle with some oil. 
Tip: Don't put more than eight rolls at once, so you can easily take them out.
Transfer the baking accessory to the Airfryer basket and bake at the indicated temperature for the recommended time.

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
description: Strawberry Cheesecake
author: nikola.kulmitzer@philips.com

steps.description: Crush digestive biscuit and mix with whipping cream. Beat the egg and add the mark of the vanilla pod. Mix cream cheese and soft flour and mix it with the other ingredients.
Put the mixture into the Philips baking accessory, put into the basket and slide the basket into the Airfryer.  Start the device with the indicated time and temperature.

Soak the gelatin until it's widened and wrinkled. Melt butter in a pot, add sugar and strawberries, bring to a boil. When boiled, mix it with a hand blender, add gelatins and bring to a boil once again. Then turn off the heat and glaze the Grand Marnier.
Top the biscuit mixture with the strawberry mousse. Refrigerate to allow the mousse to set and the flavors to mix. Remove from the baking accessory and garnish with strawberries when serve.

name: Quiche Lorraine
description: You can do a lot more than just frying in the Airfryer! You can also make this tasty quiche Lorraine. Feel free to try different varieties by swapping out ingredients.  For example swap out the ham and bacon for salmon and the mushrooms for finely chopped broccoli for a completely new spin!
author: verena.ratz@philips.com

steps.description: Mix egg, cream and chives with some pepper and salt and put it in the refrigerator.
Put the yeast with the sugar in a bowl and mix it with lukewarm milk. Let the mixture rest for a while.

Sprinkle the flour in a bowl or on your work surface and make a dimple. Add the egg, the butter and the yeast mixture. When kneading the dough, work from the inside out. Mix small amounts of flour through the wet mixture. Knead the dough well.
Grease a bowl with a little oil and put the dough in it to rise. The oil ensures that the dough does not stick to the bowl. Place a damp cloth over the bowl and let the dough rise for 1 hour.
Clean the mushrooms and cut into thin slices. Chop the onion finely.
Grease a spring form (8 inch diameter) with a little oil. Roll out the dough and place it in the spring form. Prick a few holes in the dough to prevent air bubbles.
Fill the spring form with the onion, bacon, ham, mushrooms and cheese. Then add the egg mixture and fold in the excess dough at the edges. Place the springform in the Airfryer and fry the quiche.

name: French toasted ham & cheese sandwich
description: Especially stale bread loves the treatment of soaking in egg and frying with cheese in the middle.
author: wouter.veldman_1@philips.com

steps.description: Whisk egg with milk in a bowl and shortly soak the slices of bread in this mixture.
Place cheese and ham between 2 soaked slices of bread.

Place the sandwiched bread in the basket of the Airfryer and grill at the indicated temperature and time.

Tip: In case you use the grill pan, we recommend heating it up in the Airfryer for 5 minutes before using. Brush olive oil on the pan just before adding the bread.

name: Creamy pumpkin mac and cheese
description:
Pumpkin purée adds extra creaminess and a touch of sweetness to this healthier version of comforting mac and cheese.

We used the Hokkaido pumpkin because its skin is soft and doesn't have to be peeled. This way, the beneficial fibers from the skin are preserved and add extra nutritional value to the recipe. The skin also provides a vibrant orange color. 
Only one half of the pumpkin is used in this recipe, but you can easily bake both halves and have the pumpkin purée ready for future use in similar recipes.
author: vedran.boskovic@philips.com

steps.description: Cut the pumpkin in half.  Do not peel the skin, just remove the seeds from the center of the pumpkin with a spoon.

Add the pumpkin half to the Philips Airfryer basket. Bake the pumpkin at the indicated temperature for the recommended time. 
In the meantime, cook the pasta in salted water as instructed on the packaging and set it aside.
Once the pumpkin has cooled slightly, cut it into big chunks. Add the pumpkin to a food processor with drained white beans. Blend the pumpkin and beans into a smooth purée.

Melt the butter in a deep pan. Once the butter starts to bubble, add flour. Stir for 20 seconds and then slowly add the milk to the pan. Make sure you stir the milk constantly until the mixture thickens.

Grate the cheddar cheese. Add the cheese and the pumpkin and bean purée to the thickened mixture in the pan and remove from the heat. Mix well to make sure everything is well combined and season with salt, pepper, dried thyme, and chili. Pour the sauce over the cooked pasta and mix it to make sure all the pasta is well coated. Serve warm.

name: Chocolate cupcakes with salted caramel
description:
Delicious chocolate cupcakes with salted caramel frosting, made in the Airfryer. 

Tip: Top with mini Pretzels
author: martin.sanders@philips.com

steps.description: Make sure the ingredients are at room temperature before you start and organise 2 bowls.
Add flour, cocoa powder, salt, baking powder, cinnamon and baking soda to one bowl. In another bowl you mix the powdered sugar, butter, buttermilk and egg.

Mix the flour mixture with the egg mixture. Use a spatula to stir all the ingredients into a batter. Brake the chocolate into pieces and mix in ¾ part of it into the batter. Fill 12 silicon muffin cups.
Divide the rest of the chocolate pieces over the muffin cups.

Bake the cupcakes in the basket of the Airfryer at the indicated temperature and time until an inserted skewer comes out dry. 
Let the cupcakes cool down.

Tip: Bake in batches.

To prepare the caramel sauce, add sugar with a few drops of water in a saucepan with a thick bottom on medium to high fire. The sugar starts to caramelize when it becomes translucent and bubbles start to appear. 
Move the pan until the color is even golden. Lower the heat, add the butter.
When the butter has melted, add the cream. Spin the pan until the cream is fully incorporated. Add the salt, leave to cool completely.
Put cream cheese and butter in a bowl, mix until creamy. Add sugar. Add. Most of the caramel sauce, leave some for decoration. Mix until you have a creamy and airy result.
Scoop the frosting into a piping bag with a serrated nozzle. Top the cupcakes with the frosting. Decorate with leftover caramel sauce and perhaps some mini-pretzels.
In a food processor blend the panko breadcrumbs, olive oil and salt to a fine crumb. In three separate bowls, set aside eggs, panko, and flour.
In a small pot over medium-high heat mix olive oil, finely chopped onions, peppers and celery. Cook and sweat until translucent. About 4-5 minutes.  Remove from heat and cool. Set aside.
Combine remaining ingredients: crab meat, beaten egg whites, mayonnaise, sour cream, pepper, chopped herbs and vegetables in a large mixing bowl.
Mold crab mixture to the size of golf balls. Place each ball in the flour, then into the eggs and last the panko.
Set the time and temperature as indicated and cook half the crab croquettes in the Airfryer.  Don’t overcrowd. Repeat the process till all crab croquettes are cooked and golden yellow.
Serve your crab croquettes.

name: Pear dessert with chocolate and nuts
description:
This quick dessert is fast and delicious, for when unexpected guests are staying over for dinner.

Tip: you will need the baking accessory for this recipe
author: wouter.veldman_1@philips.com

steps.description: Add the nuts in the basket of the Airfryer and roast them crunchy with the indicated temperature and time.

Remove the nuts from the basket and set aside. 
Place the pears in the baking accessory with the fluid. Place the accessory into the basket of the Airfryer and heat the pears in the juice with the indicated temperature and time until they are ready, and the juice is reduced into a thick syrup.
Brake the chocolate into small pieces. Carefully remove the pears from the accessory. Add the chocolate to the reduced juice in the baking accessory and stir with a spoon to make a chocolate sauce.
Rub the skins from the nuts with a tablecloth. Crush the nuts into crumbs with a pestle and mortar or with a knife.
Serve the pears with chocolate sauce on top and crushed hazelnuts. Enjoy with vanilla ice cream.

name: Mexican-inspired rice and lentil casserole
description:
Casseroles are a classic comfort dish featured in many cuisines. 
They are easy to prepare as a one-pot dish which can combine a variety of different ingredients into mouthwatering meals and are ideal for a quick weeknight dinner. 
This flavorful vegetarian lentil and brown rice casserole features a great portion of complex carbohydrates and fibers to put a healthy spin on classic comfort food. We've added a spicy and smokey punch to it, but you can combine other spices as well to fit your liking.

Tip: This recipe works well for using up leftover rice, quinoa, or other cooked grains that you have at hand.
author: vedran.boskovic@philips.com

steps.description: Cook the brown rice according to the instructions on the packaging. Most varieties of brown rice take around 30-45 minutes to cook. You can also use already cooked or leftover rice. In that case, skip this step. You will need around 300 g of cooked rice.

Peel and finely dice the onion and garlic. Add them to the Philips baking accessory and mix in the olive oil. Add the baking accessory to the Airfryer basket and bake at the indicated temperature for the recommended time.

Drain and rinse the canned lentils and corn. Add lentils, cooked brown rice, corn, and tomato sauce to the baking accessory. Add the seasoning and mix all the ingredients well. Top the casserole with grated cheese and bake it at the indicated temperature for the recommended time.
Let the casserole cool slightly before serving.

name: Chicken Samosa
description:
You can make these tasty party snack super quick with filo pastry. You can also use cooked chicken and potato-leftovers. This recipe however includes the preparation of homemade dough and the frying of the chicken – of course – in the Airfryer.

Tip: The recipe is for 12 pieces.
author: wouter.veldman_1@philips.com

steps.description: To make the dough, mix flour and salt in a bowl, pour in the oil and mix together. Make a dent in the middle of the flour mixture and pour in the water. Use a fork and stir from the inside out to combine water with flour until everything is mixed. Kneed to a ball of dough on a surface dusted with flour. Wrap dough in a damped cloth and set aside, while preparing the chicken filling.

Trim the skin and fat from the chicken.
Mix cumin powder, garam masala, turmeric, salt and black pepper with sunflower oil and rub the chicken with this mixture to marinade. 

Tip: Add chili flakes for a spicy twist.

Place chicken in the basket of the Airfryer and fry the chicken at the indicated temperature and time.

Tip: Instead of using boiled potatoes, you can prepare potatoes in the Airfryer, while frying the chicken. You can use young small potatoes with the skin on. Coat potato with oil and fry them in the Airfryer for 15 minutes in total. This means the chicken can be added after 5 minutes. Peel small potatoes after you fry them.

Remove the chicken from the Airfryer. Pull off and coarsely chop the meat. Peel and mash the cooked potatoes with a fork or potato masher. Finely chop the fresh parsley. Mix chicken, potato mash and parsley in a bowl with oil and lime juice.

Cut the dough into 6 pieces. Roll out the dough into a thin oblong shape. Cut this in halve, brush edges with oil. Scoop a heaped tbsp of the filling on the dough, fold over the dough and press the open edges together. Use a fork to create a nice pattern. Brush the dough balls with oil.
Place half of the samosas in the basket of the Airfryer and bake at the indicated temperature and time. Repeat for the second batch.

Serve the chicken samosa

Dipping tips: Serve with the coriander-yoghurt dip from our Vegetable pakoras recipe or serve with ketchup.

name: Broccoli sliders
description:
These sliders are a great meat replacement, they can also be eaten as burger patties.

Tip: If you prefer a vegan version of this recipe you could substitute 40 gram cheese with an extra pinch salt and 1 teaspoon tahini paste.
author: wouter.veldman_1@philips.com

steps.description: Wash the vegetables and cut them in large pieces. Use a food processor on high speed to mix the broccoli, carrot, sunflower seeds, stock powder, oatmeal, thyme, sea salt, olive oil, tahini and Parmesan cheese into a dough.
Form the sliders (discs) with your hands.
Place the sliders in the Airfryer basket and start the device at the indicated temperature and time.

name: Blooming Apple
description: Make the most of your apples, with a simple cutting technique.
author: verena.ratz@philips.com

steps.description:
Melt butter in a pan on the stove. 
In a bowl, mix apple cider vinegar, vanilla extract, maple syrup and cinnamon. Stir in the melted butter.
Halve the apples. Cut the core loose with a knife, scoop the core out with a spoon.
Carve with a knife 2 rings on the flat side. Turn around and carve the apple 8 times, do not cut through the core so that all the apple parts will stay attached.
Brush apples with the cinnamon-maple glaze.
Place the carved apple in the basket of the Airfryer and bake at the indicated temperature and time.
When ready, remove the apples form the basket. Serve on plates with a scoop of Greek yoghurt drizzled with maple syrup and dusted with extra cinnamon.
Dice the carrots and broccoli. Cook the vegetables and peas in boiling water until al dente. Wash the herbs and finely chop them.
Coarsely grate the boiled potatoes, mix with cream cheese, eggs, and herbs, and season with salt and pepper.
Cut the strudel pastry in half, spread with the potato mixture and distribute the vegetables evenly on top. Tightly roll, brush with milk, and then place the two strudels into the basket.
Bake the potato vegetable strudel in the Airfryer at the indicated time and temperature until golden brown.

name: Poached eggs
description:
Did you know you can easily prepare eggs in the Airfryer? The method we show here is to use the muffin forms. You can even top them with cheese and herbs. 

Tip: The time always depends a bit on the size and temperature of the eggs. Our eggs were done with the yolks still soft with the setting in this recipe.
author: wouter.veldman_1@philips.com

steps.description: Crack egg above the muffin cup. Optionally top with cheese or herbs.
Carefully place the muffin cup into the basket of the Airfryer and start at the indicated temperature and time.
Confirm if the egg is fully done or cook a few minutes longer. You can also leave the eggs in the Aifryer and use the residual heat until they are ready to serve.

name: Courgette stuffed
description: Tip: Delicious with yellow rice and roasted cherry tomatoes.
author: nikola.kulmitzer@philips.com

steps.description: Cut off the ends of the courgette and cut it into six equal parts. Set the parts upright and carve them out with a teaspoon. Sprinkle the inside with a little salt.

Mix the minced beef with the feta cheese, garlic, paprika powder and pepper to taste and mix well.  Divide the minced beef into six equal portions. Fill the hollow courgette parts with minced beef and press in the mixture.  Smooth the top with a moist hand.
Put the courgette in the baking accessory and place it into the basket. Slide the basket into the Airfryer. Start the device with the indicated time and temperature.
Serve your courgette stuffed with ground meat!

name: Eggplant pizza bites
description: Easy doughless version of a pizza party dish. Tip: if you leave out the ham, you can get tasty vegetarian option.
author: vedran.boskovic@philips.com

steps.description: Trim the edges of the eggplant and slice it into 1 centimeter thick slices.
Transfer the eggplant slices into the Airfryer basket and onto the double layer accessory. Bake the eggplant slices at the indicated temperature for the recommended time.
Dice the cooked ham and grate the cheese. Top the baked eggplants with tomato sauce, ham, cheese, and spices.
Bake the eggplants pizza bites, using the double layer accessory, at the indicated temperature for the recommended time.
Cut the chicken thigh filets into pieces. Marinate 20 minutes in soy sauce, chili paste and finely chopped garlic.
Prepare the udon noodles and drain. Mix with the sesame oil.
Bake the chicken as indicated below, giving it a shake now and then.
Add the shiitake mushrooms, button mushrooms, sliced red onion, bean sprouts and asparagus. Cook again (give them a good shake twice while cooking).
Stir in the noodles and cook again as indicated below. Sprinkle with the sesame seeds.

name: Rice Pudding with Apple
description: Tip: You can serve the rice pudding with apple as a dessert or as a main dish.
author: kathrin.olipitz_1@philips.com

steps.description: First, heat up the rice, milk, and salt in a saucepan and let simmer until the rice is soft. Then, stir in the cinnamon and let cool.
In the meantime, zest the lemon and squeeze out the juice. Then, peel and core the apple and cut into slices, sprinkling with a little lemon juice.
Beat the egg whites until they form stiff peaks. Cream the butter, sugar, and lemon zest. Stir in the egg yolk and add the rice. Fold in the beaten egg whites lightly. Stir in the apples quickly.
Pour the mixture into the baking accessory and bake at the indicated time and temperature.
Remove the rice pudding from the Airfryer, sprinkle with confectioner's sugar and serve.

name: Blueberrymuffins
description: Tip: The muffins can also be prepared with other berries or pieces of fruit.
author: kathrin.olipitz_1@philips.com

steps.description: Beat the sugar and egg until foamy. Slowly stir in buttermilk and oil.
Mix flour, baking powder and cinnamon. Stir the mass, but stir only until all ingredients are moist. Quickly stir in the blueberries.
Divide the dough in the muffin cups (about two tablespoons per muffin cup) and bake in several batches in the Airfryer at the specified time and temperature.
Then take the blueberry muffins out of the Airfryer. Let them cool down and then remove them from the molds.

name: Chinese roast chicken with lemon
description: Best choice for chicken lovers! The chicken skin is golden and oily with overflowing lemon fragrance, and the meat is firm and juicy. Say bye-bye to the tableware, just tear with your hands and enjoy it!
author: yudan.chang@philips.com

steps.description: Clean the whole chicken and wash it carefully.

Put the chicken in a large container, and then spread the chicken inside and outside with sea salt, rosemary, lemon juice, onion, garlic and thyme. After the ingredients are spread, marinate the chicken with the ingredients in a container for 30 minutes.

Mix water and honey in a ratio of 1:1 to make honey water. Wipe off the ingredients on the chicken and evenly coat the chicken with honey water. Put the whole chicken on the Airfryer basket, and slide the basket into the Airfryer. Start the device with the indicated time and temperature
Take out and serve on a platter. Enjoy the delicious chicken with lemon flavor.

name: Bruschetta with pesto and various toppings
description:
You can create any type of bruschetta you want, this recipe shows a tomato, mushroom and courgette version. 

Tip: Depending on your Airfryer model you can grill more slices of bread on one go.
author: wouter.veldman_1@philips.com

steps.description: Slice the bread. Thinly slice the courgette. Brush the mushrooms clean. Halve or quarter the cherry tomatoes. Finely chop the cheese.
Spread pesto on all the slices of bread. Add 3 different toppings: zucchini, cherry tomatoes and mushrooms. You can finish to your own taste with pine nuts, cheese and balsamic vinegar.
Place the slices of bread into the basket of the Airfryer and grill them at the indicated temperature and time.

name: Crispy Prawns
description: Recipe by Guido Weber
author: nikola.kulmitzer@philips.com

steps.description: Devein the prawns, wash and pat dry. Season to taste with salt and pepper.
Place the egg whites in a bowl and very finely crush the tortilla chips.
Dip the prawns into the egg whites and then roll them around in the crushed tortilla chips, and firmly knead them in.
Place the coated prawns in the basket of the Airfryer, close the Airfryer and bake at the indicated time and temperature.

name: Green velvet layer cake
description:
This unusual cake will surely surprise you with its fresh flavors! 
This dessert is our twist on the velvet cake, made with spinach, ricotta cheese, and orange.  
Spinach makes the color pop vibrant green while having a very subtle taste, which will make your guests wonder about the secret ingredient.
author: vedran.boskovic@philips.com

steps.description:
Defrost the spinach and remove any excess water. In a medium-sized bowl, mix together the flour, baking powder, and salt and set aside.
Add two eggs, vanilla extract, sugar, lemon juice, and defrosted, drained spinach to the blender jar. Close the lid and run the blender at maximum speed for 30 seconds.
Put the blender on lower speed and remove the center cap. Slowly pour the olive oil through the lid and create an emulsion.

Turn off the blender and add the flour mixture in small amounts to the jar using a spoon.
 Turn on the blender for another 20-30 seconds. Everything should be well incorporated.
Slightly grease the baking accessory with some olive oil and pour in the mixture. Help yourself with a spatula to transfer all the mixture from the jar if necessary.

Place the baking accessory in the Airfryer basket and start the appliance with the indicated temperature and time. When done, remove the cake from the baking accessory and let it cool down on the cooling rack. In the meantime, prepare the cream.

Add the ricotta, yoghurt, orange and lemon juice, and honey to a medium-sized bowl. Mix with a hand mixer until well combined. 
Tip: The honey in this step is optional, you can leave it out for a less sweet version.
Crumble the cake into small pieces with your hands. Peel the orange and slice out orange fillets.

Assemble the dessert by placing 1 tablespoon of crumbled cake in the bottom. Add 2 tablespoons of the ricotta cream on top of the crumbs. Repeat once more so that you end up with 2 layers of cake crumbs and 2 layers of the ricotta cream. Finish the dessert with some orange fillets and orange zest on top.

name: Grilled chicory on sourdough bread with blue cheese
description: A great lunch after a morning full of sports or working out.
author: luc.swaan@philips.com

steps.description: Peel and chop the garlic. Halve the chicories, remove the bitter centre and place them in a large bowl with the chopped garlic. Mix with olive oil, honey, mustard, orange zest and orange juice.
Place the chicory in the Philips baking accessory and sprinkle with pine nuts. Place the baking accessory in the Airfryer and roast the chicory with the indicated time and temperature.
Chop the parseley and sprinkle over the grilled chicory. Spread half of the slices of bread with cheese. Top with ham and roasted chicory and finish with another slice of bread.

name: Moroccan sweet lamb
description: The tajine is a popular Moroccan dish prepared in a special clay pot called a tajine, from which the dish also takes its name. This recipe is inspired by this famous dish and cooking method.
author: darko.kontin@infinum.hr

steps.description: Cut the lamb leg meat into small chunks. Remove any excess fat during this process. Put the meat into a bowl and set aside.
Peel and finely dice the onion. Slice the date, dried apricot, and dried plum into small pieces. Add all the ingredients into the bowl with the meat and mix them together.

Season the meat and dried fruit mixture with salt, pepper, and cinnamon. Add chopped tomatoes into the bowl and pour water to cover all the ingredients. Mix well and transfer into the Philips baking accessory. Put the baking accessory into the basket.
Put the basket in the Airfryer. Start the device with the indicated time and temperature.
Give the tajine inside the baking accessory a good stir. Put the basket back in the Airfryer. Start the device at the indicated temperature and time.
Serve warm with cooked couscous.

name: Chestnut Soufflé
description: Tip: Before serving, garnish the chestnut soufflé with, for example, whipped cream and amarena cherries or chocolate chips.
author: kathrin.olipitz_1@philips.com

steps.description: Blend the chestnut purée with whipping cream, confectioner's sugar and vanilla sugar, as well as a shot of rum in a large bowl until smooth.
Separate the eggs, whisk the egg whites with a pinch of salt until they form stiff peaks, gradually add the sugar and beat until the sugar has completely dissolved.
Stir the egg yolks into the chestnut mixture and carefully fold in the egg white peaks alternately with the flour and starch base.

Fill muffin tins with the soufflé mixture — but only fill 2/3 of each muffin tin! Place them in the basket in the Airfryer and bake them at the indicated time and temperature. If necessary, bake in several batches.
Allow the chestnut soufflé to cool before serving.
Devein the prawns, wash and pat dry. Season to taste with salt and pepper.
Place the egg whites in a bowl and very finely crush the tortilla chips.
Dip the prawns into the egg whites and then roll them around in the crushed tortilla chips, firmly knead them in.
Place the coated prawns in the basket of the Airfryer, close the Airfryer and bake at the indicated time and temperature.

name: Baked cheese-filled crepes
description:
Try our tasty recipe for crepes filled with cottage cheese and raisins that can be served for breakfast or as a dessert. 
Tip: If you have some leftover crepes, this is the perfect recipe to reuse them.
author: vedran.boskovic@philips.com

steps.description: In a medium-sized bowl, mix the flour, 1 egg, milk, mineral water, and salt using a hand mixer. Make sure there are no lumps. Bake crepes using one ladle of batter per crepe.

For the filling, mix well the cottage cheese, 1 egg, and raisins. Divide the mixture between six crepes. Roll up each crepe tightly. Put the crepes into the Airfryer basket. Spread two tablespoons of sour cream evenly on top of the crepes.
Bake at the indicated temperature for the recommended time.
Serve the crepes with some yoghurt and if you want with a drizzle of honey.

name: Festive Beetroot Salad
description: Turn a side dish into one of the stars of your festive meal with our recipe for a salad wreath, decorated and enriched with rich, earthy roasted beetroots.
author: mirta.stipanicev@philips.com

steps.description: Wash the beetroots and pat them dry. Put the beetroots into the Airfryer basket and bake them at the indicated temperature for the recommended time.

Let the beetroots cool for a couple of minutes after baking. Then peel them and cut them into wedges. Put the beetroot wedges into a jar and pour a mixture of white wine vinager and water over them. Store the beetroots in this mixture in the fridge overnight.

Before you start preparing the salad, prepare the vinaigrette. 
Mix extra virgin olive oil, white wine vinegar, freshly squeezed orange juice, salt, black pepper, honey, and mustard in a bowl.

Wash the lettuce and cut it into small pieces. Peel the orange and slice it into pieces. Place the lettuce on plate around a small bowl of the vinaigrette, like a wreath. Arrange the pickled beetroots and orange pieces over the lettuce. Crumble some feta cheese and add some walnuts and pomegranate on top of the salad. Finish the salad with a drizzle of vinaigrette.

name: BBQ Pork Char Siu
description:
An authentic Chinese recipe!

Tip: You could replace the Chinese rosé wine with Japanese mirin, gin or a dry white wine. Maltose could be replaced by another sweet syrup.
author: nikola.kulmitzer@philips.com

steps.description: Mix all ingredients together, besides pork and garlic, and warm through in a sauce pan until all the sugar has dissolved. Set this sauce aside to cool.
Marinate the pork strips with the cooled char siu sauce and add the chopped garlic.  Leave for at least eight hours in the fridge.

Shake off excess char siu sauce. Put the char siu strips in the basket and slide the basket into the Airfryer.  Start the device with the indicated time and temperature. Brush the remaining char siu sauce in between roasting.
Lower the temperature and roast until it is perfectly charred.
Serve your BBQ Pork Char Siu!

name: Oriental Falafel balls
description: Falafel balls are a chickpea dish that can be prepared within minutes. They can be served as a side dish to lamb, but also work great as a whole meal.
author: darko.kontin@infinum.hr

steps.description: Drain the chickpeas and pat them dry with a paper towel.

Add the chickpeas, garlic, parsley leaves, flour, olive oil, salt, black pepper, cumin and coriander to a food processor.
Start the food processor and wait until all ingredients are finely chopped. 
Tip: Be careful not to overprocess the falafel mixture, as it will not hold together well. You should see and feel chickpea chunks in the mixture. If you do not have a food processor, use a mortar and pestle to combine all of the ingredients.

Use a 50 ml measuring spoon or tablespoon to scoop equal portions of the falafel mixture and shape them into 4 cm sized balls with your hands. 
Place falafel balls in the Airfryer basket.

Put the basket in the Airfryer.
Start the device with the indicated time and temperature.
Serve falafel balls with a green salad, Greek yogurt and pita bread.

name: Moist Zucchini Cake
description: Tip: The zucchini cake can also be sprinkled with nuts. Adding a chocolate glaze to the zucchini cake is an extremely delicious option.
author: kathrin.olipitz_1@philips.com

steps.description: Coarsely chop the butter, place on a plate, and set aside. Wash the zucchini, cut off the ends and cut in half lengthwise. Remove the spongy insides of the zucchini with a spoon. Finely grate the zucchini and squeeze out the liquid.
Separate the eggs. Mix the soft butter with confectioner's sugar, vanilla sugar, and the lemon zest in a large bowl until fluffy. Gradually fold in the egg yolks. Stir in the zucchini.
Beat the egg whites with salt until they form stiff peaks. Mix the flour with the walnuts and corn starch, alternating, fold in the egg whites and the zucchini butter mixture.

Pour into the baking accessory and bake at the indicated time and temperature. Allow to cool and then let the cake fall out of the pan.

Tip: Make sure the baking form in max filled at 2/3 - Any leftover batter can be used to make cupcakes.
For the icing, mix the confectioner's sugar with lemon juice into a thick mixture. If the lemon juice is not sufficient, then add some drops of lukewarm water.
Spread the icing on the cake and allow to set.

name: Squid strips barbecue
description: Sweet, tasty, every bite is a taste of love.
author: yudan.chang@philips.com

steps.description: Wash carefully and cut the cleaned squid into strips.

Put squid strips in the Airfryer baking accessory. Add cooking wine and vegetable oil (15 g) to the squid strips in turn. Put the Airfryer baking accessory into frying basket and slide the basket into the Airfryer. Start the device with the indicated time and temperature to allow the squid to absorb the sauce.

Pull out the baking accessory from the Airfryer. Add salt, sugar, chicken essence seasoning, vegetable oil (20 g), light soy sauce, chili powder, cumin powder, chopped garlic in the baking accessory, and mix them with squid strips evenly. Set the time and temperature again. Tip: The baking time must be controlled within 10 minutes, otherwise the squid will be difficult to chew.
Serve on a platter.

name: Roasted shrimp cocktail
description:
A classic dish made easy.

Tip: The first 2 steps add more flavor to the shrimps. They can be omitted for a quicker result.
Tip: Chervil tastes like a combination of parsley and tarragon. You could substitute chervil by one or both of these herbs.
author: wouter.veldman_1@philips.com

steps.description: Roast the garlic cloves in the skin, place them in the Airfryer and start the device with the indicated time and temperature.
Puree the garlic and mix the water, lemon juice, salt and sugar in a large bowl. Add the shrimps and refrigerate for 1 hour.
Make the cocktail sauce in a bowl. Add lemon and olive oil, whisk to emulsify. Mix in the ketchup, yoghurt, hot sauce and sea salt.
Drain the shrimps, pat dry. In a bowl, coat the shrimps with olive oil and thread them on the skewers.
Place the shrimps in the Airfryer basket and start the device with the indicated temperature and time.
Chop the chervil finely. Mix lemon juice with olive oil and the chopped chervil.
When the shrimps are ready, immediately coat with the chervil dressing and serve with the sauce.

name: Spicy Mango and Orange Muffins with Red Chili Pepper
description: Many people throw away the pulp left over by their slow juicer, which is a shame because you can use it to make delicious fruit muffins! First create a spicy mango and orange juice and then make these muffins.
author: luc.swaan@philips.com

steps.description: First make a spicy mango juice by processing the mango, orange and half a chili pepper (de-seeded) in the slow juicer. Set this mixture aside until you use it for the muffins. Don't discard the leftover pulp!
Sieve the flour, baking powder and salt into a bowl. Melt the butter and then let it cool down slightly.
In a second bowl, beat the egg together with the almond flour, mango and orange juice, brown sugar and melted butter.
Sieve the flour mixture from the first bowl into the bowl containing the egg mixture.
Fold the flour mixture into the egg mixture for approx. 15 seconds. Then briefly fold in the mango and orange pulp (do not stir).
Divide the batter between 12 muffin cups. Sprinkle the cane sugar over them and bake in the Airfryer.
Take the muffins out the Airfryer and place them directly onto a cooling rack. Finally, decorate them with a very fine slice of chili pepper and, if you fancy, with some candied fruit.

name: Fish & chips with ravigote sauce and refreshing fennel-cucumber salad
description: Tip Airfryer users: If you have the multi-layer accessory, you can prepare the fish for the last 12 minutes of the preparation of the fries on the accessory on the fries. An Airfryer bakes with air, which does not transfer flavor at all.
author: feline.van.hout@philips.com

steps.description: Peel the potatoes and cut them into ½ - 1 cm thick fries. Soak the fries in water for at least 30 minutes. Drain them thoroughly, and pat them dry with kitchen paper.  Mix them with 1 tbsp olive oil per person and bake in the Airfryer. Shake in between for optimal results.

Cut the fennel in half, then cut it into quarters and remove the hard core. Then cut the fennel into thin slices. Using a peeler, separate the cucumber into thin slices. Strip the mint leaves from the stems and finely chop the leaves.

In a salad bowl, mix a dressing of per person: ½ tbsp extra virgin olive oil, ½ tbsp white balsamic vinegar, ½ tsp mustard, salt and pepper. Mix the fennel, cucumber and mint with the dressing. Set aside and stir regularly.

Divide 1 tbsp flour person over a deep plate. Whisk the eggs in a different deep plate. In another deep plate, mix the panko with the paprika, salt & pepper. Cut the fish in half lengthwise, so you end up with 2 pieces per person. Rub the fish with salt and pepper on both sides. Dip the fish through the plate with flour, then through the egg (making sure the fish is completely covered with egg) and finally dip the fish through the panko mixture (make sure the fish is fully coated in panko).

Prepare a plate covered with kitchen paper, to place the fish on after frying. Heat 5 tbsp sunflower oil per person in a frying pan on medium-high heat. Make sure that the oil is really hot, then fry the fish for 3 - 4 minutes per side. The fish is done once it has a golden brown crust.
Transfer the fries and fried fish to plates. Serve with the ravigote sauce and the salad.

name: Mackerel rice bowl
description:
Mackerel is a bit underrated. This recipe shows how easy you can prepare an Asian styled meal with smoked mackerel.

Tip: This recipe uses the baking accessory, or a heat-resistant dish that fits your Airfryer.
author: wouter.veldman_1@philips.com

steps.description: Cook the rice according to the package description, while you prepare the mackerel in the Airfryer.
Remove the skin from the mackerel, cut the flesh from the bones, remove the stray bones. Break the flesh into large pieces.

Remove the outer leafs of the lemongrass and finely chop it.
Peel and finely chop the ginger.
Trim and thinly slice the fennel, spring onion. Peel the carrot and halve lengthways and cut into thin slices. 
Put the lemongrass and vegetables into the baking accessory, add soy sauce, sesame oil, vinegar and chili paste and stir to mix the ingredients.
Put the baking accessory into the basket of the Airfryer and start the device at the indicated temperature and time.
Place the mackerel on top of the stewed vegetables. Heat the mackerel in the Airfryer at the indicated temperature and time.
Serve the mackerel and vegetables with the rice.

name: Chocolate & blueberry Halloween cupcakes
description: These delicious chocolatey cupcakes are quick to make and can be decorated to create a host of spooky Halloween characters.
author: vedran.boskovic@philips.com

steps.description: Add the flour, sugar, cocoa powder, and baking powder into a bowl. Mix and combine all the dry ingredients.
Pour the milk and oil into the bowl with dry ingredients. Whisk all the ingredients by hand into chocolate batter.
Pour the muffin batter into five Philips Airfryer silicone muffin cups. Divide the blueberries between the muffin cups and press them into the batter. Put the muffin cups into the basket.
Put the basket in the Airfryer. Start the device with the indicated temperature and time. Repeat this step for the second batch of muffins.
In a mixing bowl, soften the butter with a hand mixer. Combine the softened butter and powdered sugar. Using a hand mixer, mix all the ingredients together until they form a thick cream.
Once baked, let the muffins cool for five minutes before starting to decorate them.

Divide the mixed frosting into five separate bowls. Use five natural vegan food colors (orange, purple, green, blue, yellow) to color the frosting. We used 1 teaspoon of each, but you should prepare the colors according to the package instructions and mix them well into the frosting. Keep the bowls in a cool place until ready to use.

Use white, black, and blue fondant to create eyes. Sprinkle some powdered sugar on the working surface and roll out a small piece of fondant. Make two or three different sizes using a small round cutter or metal straw. To stick one piece of the fondant eye to another, dip your finger in a small bowl of water and smudge the water over the surface where you’ll be sticking the other piece.

To get the bloody eye effect on white fondant, you should have a small amount of powdered color set aside. Put your fingertip in water, just to make it wet. Then put it gently in purple (or red) color; a very small amount of color should stick to your finger. Tap the colored finger on the fondant a few times to smudge it with color. You can also use a small brush instead of your finger.
Making a fondant ghost is very simple. Cut out a round shape of white fondant and fold it over your index finger to create the desired shape.

To create black pupils for the eyes, mix the powdered sugar with egg whites, lemon juice, and 1 teaspoon of black natural vegan food color. If the mixture is too liquid, add more powdered sugar. Put the cupcakes in the fridge so that the paste cools down and hardens.

For a spider decoration, any chocolate cookie with filling will work. Cut the chocolate sticks in half to make legs. Those with round ends will make your spider look better. Separate the cookie, stick the chocolate sticks to the filling and return the top cookie half. Add fondant eyes for a better effect.

Use the green frosting for a green monster cupcake. Pipe it out on the muffin and shape a head using a butter knife. Dip the top of the head into chocolate sprinkles to make hair. Add eyes made of fondant and some chocolate sticks for the ears.

food.nameSingular: natural food coloring (orange, purple, green, blue, yellow, black)

name: Steak shoarma with paprika sauce
description:
Now you can prepare your favourite steak sandwich using the Airfryer. And it is a lot healthier because we got creative and added extra vegetables to the sauce. Also super for the kids! 

Tip: for the bell pepper sauce you could also use grilled peppers from a jar and skip step 1 of the preparations. 
Tip: Use a special shoarma herb mix instead of a mix of cayenne, cumin powder and parsley for the authentic shoarma flavor.
author: sandra.pilkes@philips.com

steps.description: Place the bell peppers and the unpeeled garlic cloves in the basket of the Airfryer. Roast the pepper on the indicated temperature and time until the skin is lightly roasted.

Remove the skin, stem and seeds from the bell peppers. Press the garlic from the rind. Puree the roasted bell peppers in food processor or using a hand blender together with the garlic and thyme leaves. Mix the Greek yogurt through by hand and bring the sauce to taste with a little salt and freshly ground pepper.

Peel and slice the onion. Cut the steak into strips. 
Mix the cayenne pepper, cumin powder and parsley in a large bowl with some olive oil and season to taste with salt and a little freshly ground pepper. Brush the pita breads with a brush with the herb oil and put aside. Add the steak and onions to the bowl with herb oil and mix to marinate.
Place the pita in the Airfryer basket at the specified time and temperature.
Remove the pita from the Airfryer. Place the steak and onions in the basket of the Airfryer. Bake until the meat is tender at the specified time and temperature.
Cut the pita breads open. Fill the rolls with the beef steak, onion and paprika sauce.

Cut the vegetables into coarse pieces. Place the vegetables into a bowl and mix with the finely chopped garlic, herbes de Provence, salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste. Stir in the olive oil and vinegar.

Mix together the finely chopped parsley, breadcrumbs, cheese, olive oil and freshly ground black pepper to taste. Put the vegetable mixture in the Philips baking accessory and put the cheese mixture on top.
Place the baking accessory in the Airfryer basket and slide the basket into the Airfryer. Start the device with the indicated time and temperature.
When the ratatouille is done, leave it to cool in the Airfryer for 3 to 4 minutes. before sliding out the basket and serving the dish.

name: French toast with ham and cheese
description: Bonjour! A French style breakfast starts your wonderful day. Have the salty and sweet French toast with aromatic cheese and enjoy your day!
author: yudan.chang@philips.com

steps.description: Brush a layer of butter on the toast, then place cheese and ham slices on the bottom toast, and then cover with another slice of toast brushed with butter on the inside. Tip:  Choose thick-cut toast for a better taste and appearance.

Crack 2 raw eggs into a bowl and stir them evenly clock-wise. Cut off the four hard sides of toast slices, then dip the slices into stirred raw egg liquid till they are fully covered. Put slices into the Airfryer, and start the device with indicated time and temperature:
Serve and enjoy!

Peel the garlic cloves. Wash the carrot and slice it. Wash the pork neck under cold water.                 Make shallow pockets in the meat with a knife. Insert the cloves of garlic and the slices of carrot into different pockets. Rub the meat with salt and pepper.
Place the pork in the baking accessory and the accessory in the Airfryer basket. Slide basket into the Airfryer. Start the device with the time and temperature indicated below.

Cool the roasted pork for two hours, cut into slices, place on dishes and serve. 
Tips: Serve decorated with cedar nuts, pre-roasted in a frying pan for 4-5 minutes, to taste.  
The roasted pork may be served with potatoes and vegetables.

name: Fluffy muffins
description: Fluffy muffins with raisins
author: nikola.kulmitzer@philips.com

steps.description: Wash the raisins in cold water and soak for 20 minutes. To prepare the dough, beat the room temperature butter and sugar to a homogeneous mass. Add eggs one after another while beating. Then add flour, baking powder, raisins and salt and beat for 5 minutes.
Put the dough in the muffin cups and place them into the basket of the Airfryer. Slide the basket into the Airfryer. Start the device with the indicated time and temperature.

Serve your Fluffy muffins with raisins!  

Tip: The muffins may be sprinkled with icing sugar.

name: Salmon filet
description: Fresh salmon fillet with dill sauce. In case you like the salmon more crispy, cut the fillet into 4 pieces before cooking.
author: nikola.kulmitzer@philips.com

steps.description: Take the salmon fillets and drizzle with olive oil over each piece and add salt to taste.
Place the salmon into the basket and slide the basket into the Airfryer. Start the device with the indicated time and temperature.
