While the salmon is cooking, combine the yogurt, sour cream, chopped dill and salt in a mixing bowl. Leave a pinch of chopped dill as a garnish for the top of the salmon.
Garnish with sea salt and dill and serve.

name: Chocolate banana
description: Tips: You can also use chocolate with whole nuts or special filling. If your bananas are bigger ones the cooking time can ba extended for a few minutes.
author: nikola.kulmitzer@philips.com

steps.description: With a sharp knife, make a deep lengthwise cut into the banana, but make sure you don‘t cut through. Then fill the slit with 5 pieces of chocolate.
Place the filled bananas on the non-stick grill pan or in the Aifryer basket.
For serving, cut the banana into portions. Use a tablespoon to get out the banana pulp with the melted chocolate.
Boil and mash the potato.                                                Add finely chopped carrot, beans and peas. Add salt and pepper as per taste.

Cut the bread slice diagonally into fours. Apply the mixture on top of each bread slice. Mix cornflour and refined flour. Add water to make a thick paste. Coat the slices with this paste. Sprinkle sesame seeds on top of the vegetable mixture. Brush the slices with oil.
Place bread slices in the basket. Slide basket into the Airfryer. Slide the basket into the Airfryer. Start the device with the indicated time and temperature.
Serve hot with chutney!

name: Roasted tomato-pepper soup with sour cream and breadsticks au gratin
author: feline.van.hout@philips.com

steps.description: Cut the tomatoes into quarters and the red pepper into strips. Coarsely chop the red onion and the garlic. Roughly tear half the basil leaves, save the sprigs.

Mix the tomato, bell pepper, red onion, half of the garlic, the basil sprigs and half of the basil leaves. Drizzle the vegetables with the olive oil, black balsamic vinegar and paprika and mix well. Season with salt and pepper and roast the vegetables in the Airfryer basket.
Meanwhile, cut the baguette lengthways into breadsticks 1 - 2 cm wide. Drizzle with a little olive oil and sprinkle with the grated cheese and other garlic. Also prepare the bouillon in a soup pan.
After step 2, fry the breadsticks quickly and easily in the Airfryer along with the vegetables.
Meanwhile add the vegetables, including the cooking liquid, to a stockpot. Puree the vegetables with a hand blender and add the stock until the soup has the desired consistency.
Divide the soup among the bowls. Garnish the soup with the sour cream and the remaining basil. Serve with the breadsticks.
Place thinly sliced potatoes into a mixing bowl full of water. Soak the potatoes for 30 minutes, changing the water 2–3 times. Drain thoroughly and pat completely dry with a paper towel.

In a mixing bowl, toss the potatoes, olive oil and chopped rosemary. Place potatoes into the cooking basket and slide into the Airfryer. Set the Airfryer to the temperature and time indicated below and fry until golden brown, shaking 2–3 times to ensure chips are cooked evenly.
When finished and still warm, toss in a large bowl with salt and pepper.

name: Spring salad with grilled asparagus, tomato and feta
description:
The asparagus season is short so let’s use it to full capacity to enjoy the delicious vegetable as often as possible. Crisp asparagus matches perfectly with fruity tomatoes and creamy feta.

Tip: Serve with fresh or roasted wholegrain bread.
author: wouter.veldman_1@philips.com

steps.description:
Place the almond flakes in the basket of the Airfryer, position the snack cover and roast at the indicated temperature and time until golden.

Tip: The snack cover is needed for these light almonds. You can also use a pan on the stove.
Wash the asparagus, then remove the lower part of it. Cut into bite-sized pieces and cover with olive oil.
Place the grill pan with asparagus into the Airfryer and grill at the indicated temperature and time.
Meanwhile, wash and cut the cherry tomatoes. Cut the feta into cubes. In a bowl, mix the balsamic vinegar with the olive oil to make the dressing.
Finish the salad by mixing the grilled asparagus with the chopped tomatoes, feta cubes, roasted almond flakes and the balsamic-dressing.

name: Cottage cheese and spinach buns
description: Cottage cheese and spinach buns are light in texture, quick to prepare, and so delicious. You will be in love with these buns at first bite.
author: vedran.boskovic@philips.com

steps.description: Put the flour, dry yeast, olive oil, salt, and honey into a medium-sized bowl.
Add lukewarm water to the flour mixture. Knead the dough for at least 5 to 8 minutes until it is smooth and elastic.
Leave the dough covered in a warm place to rise for at least 60 minutes or wait until it doubles in size.
Chop the spinach and mix it with the shredded Gouda cheese, cottage cheese, and salt.
Roll out the dough to 1 cm thick. Cut it into 9 equal-sized pieces and add 1 tablespoon of filling. Connect the edges of the dough and make balls.
Transfer the dough balls to the baking accessory and brush them with a beaten egg. Sprinkle some linseeds on top.
Transfer the baking accessory to the basket and bake at the indicated temperature for the recommended time.

name: Crispy Mushrooms
description: Tip: Serve the crispy mushrooms with tartar sauce.
author: verena.ratz@philips.com

steps.description: First, clean the mushrooms. Tip: Clean the mushrooms with a brush instead of washing them off with water.
Place the flour, beaten egg, and bread crumbs on separate plates. Coat the mushrooms one after another in the flour, egg, and bread crumbs.
Brush the mushrooms with oil and put them in the basket of the Airfryer and bake at the indicated time and temperature until the mushrooms are crispy.
Season the mushrooms with salt and serve.

name: Chicken drumettes
description:
You can prepare loads of chicken drumettes in the Airfryer, ideal as a party snack or as part of a nice meal. 

Tip: This recipe is created with the Airfryer XXL, but you can fry chicken in any Airfryer model. The amount of ingredients needs to be adjusted or you can fry in batches.
author: martin.sanders@philips.com

steps.description: First make the marinade by mixing the barbecue sauce, peanut oil, curry, salt, pepper and paprika powder into a marinade. Press the garlic and mix it with the marinade.
Marinate the chicken drumettes and put them in a bag. Close the bag and leave the marinade for at least 1 hour.

Place the chicken drumettes in the Airfryer basket and bake at the indicated temperature and time.
Tip: When ready, check if the chicken is fully cooked inside. You might need to fry another few minutes.
Rub refined flour and ghee together. Add water and knead stiff dough.
For the filling, mix grated khoya, chopped cashew nut, raisin, cardamom and sugar in a bowl.

Divide the dough into equal portions. Roll out thin rounds of the dough. Place them on the gujiya mould. Brush the edges of the mould with plain water. Place a spoonful of the filling in the middle of the mould and press together the edges of the mould.
Brush the gujiyas with oil and place them into the basket. Slide the basket into the Airfryer. Start the device with the indicated time and temperature.
Serve your Gujiya!  Tip: You may dip the gujiya in thick sugar syrup if desired.

name: Puff pastry apple pie bites with honey
description: Delicious apple pie flavors in crispy puff pastry shell. A simple dessert for any occasion.
author: darko.kontin@infinum.hr

steps.description: Peel, remove seeds and dice the apple into small cubes. Put the diced apple in a small saucepan over medium heat and wait for it to soften. Once the apple starts to be soft and juicy, add cinnamon and remove the apple from the heat.

Dust some flour on a clean surface and roll the puff pastry dough out to a thickness of 2 mm.
Tip: Use fresh puff pastry which is already rolled for an even faster preparation of these puff pastry apple pies.

Using a round 5 cm cutter, cut out an even number of circles.
Using a knife, cut three parallel lines on half of the pastry circles. Those will be the top layers for apple pies.
Use the leftover dough to roll out a new sheet of puff pastry for extra pastry circles.

Drop a teaspoon of the apple and cinnamon mixture in the middle of each uncut pastry circle. Brush the edges of the pastry with the beaten egg and top it with the puff pastry circle that has parallel cuts.

Use a fork to connect the two pastry layers. 
Tip: You can do this with fingers as well, but using a fork will result in a  more uniform look.

Place the puff pastry bites in the basket making sure you leave enough space close to the edges for the Philips double layer accessory. Also, leave about 2 cm of space between puff pastry bites. 
Brush them with the beaten egg. 
Place the rest of the apple pies on the double layer accessory, brush them with the beaten egg as well, and put the accessory in the basket.

Put the basket in the Airfryer.
Start the device with the indicated time and temperature.

Bake apple pie bites until golden.
Dust them with powdered sugar and serve with honey.

name: Potato Casserole with Smoked Salmon
description: Recipe by Guido Weber
author: kathrin.olipitz_1@philips.com

steps.description: Slice the peeled potatoes into thin sticks, rinse and pat dry with paper towels. Place the shallots and diced bacon in the with margarine greased baking accessory  and sauté at the indicated time and temperature.
Add the potatoes and fry at the indicated time and temperature.
Slice the smoked salmon into strips and place them under the potatoes.
Mix the flour, eggs, and milk with a hand mixer at medium speed until smooth. Season with salt, pepper, nutmeg, and marjoram. Add chopped parsley and chives.
Pour the mixture over the potatoes and bake in the Airfryer at the indicated time and temperature.

name: Vegetable pakoras
description: These fritters are a healthy version of the deep-fried ones, the trick is to include mashed chickpeas in the batter and fry them until they are crispy from the outside.
author: wouter.veldman_1@philips.com

steps.description: Peel the sweet potato and carrot. Run them through a food processor with grating insert. Trim ends of the spring onion and finely slice it.
In a large bowl, mix cumin, cayenne pepper, garam masala, salt, lemon juice and olive oil. Add the chickpeas and use a fork to mash them.
Add chickpea flour, mix into the batter. Add the grated sweet potato, carrot and sliced spring onion and stir these vegetables into the batter.

Place scoops of the vegetable batter in the basket of the Airfryer. The pakoras can be formed into perfect balls, but when you just scoop them, they will be organically disformed, and have more crunchy edges as a result.

Tip: Makes about 16 scoops, that should fit the XXL basket.
Fry the pakoras in the Airfryer at the indicated temperature and time until crunchy with slightly soft cores.
Meanwhile prepare a dip sauce. Add fresh coriander, lime juice, olive oil, yoghurt, salt and pepper into a jar and mix with a hand blender until smooth.
Serve the pakoras on a plate with the coriander-yoghurt dip.

name: Stir-fried baby potato with cumin
description: This is a favorite of potato lovers! The freshly stir-fried baby potatoes with cumin are soft and so delicious!
author: yudan.chang@philips.com

steps.description: Wash and cut baby potatoes into halves before placing them in a larger container. Tip: Suggest to select potatoes of uniform size to ensure the same degree of cooking.
Add vegetable oil (10 g), cumin powder, oregano leaves, thyme, salt, and cumin seeds in order. Mix well with the small potatoes and marinate for 5 minutes.

Put marinated baby potatoes into baking accessory. Then put the baking accessory into frying basket, slide the basket into Airfryer. Sprinkle the potatoes with vegetable oil (10 g). Start the device with the indicated time and temperature:
Take out and serve!

name: Matcha and red bean mooncake
description: With lovely appearance, tea fragrance, and sweet but not greasy red bean filling, this is a must-have snack for dessert lovers.
author: yudan.chang@philips.com

steps.description: Prepare red bean paste stuffing: divide red bean paste evenly into 12 pieces of 20 grams each. Round them and put into fridge for later use. Then prepare mooncake pastry: mix powdered sugar with softened butter, egg liquid, whipped cream and coconut milk. Then add into sieved low-gluten powder and matcha powder. Knead the dough and then put into the fridge for over 1 hour. Tip: You can cover the dough within plastic wrap before putting into fridge.

Divide mooncake pastry into 12 pieces of 28 grams each. Knead a ball of each piece of pastry first, then press them hard from top down on your countertop, so you get 12 pieces of flat pastry wrap. Put the red bean paste stuffing in centre of the pastry wrap and carefully fold the pastry wrap around the paste into a ball shape. Put the filled pastry balls into the mooncake mold one by one, and press hard to produce mooncakes. Tip1: Please buy mooncake molds in advance at the bakery. Tip2: Sprinkle a small amount of low-gluten flour evenly on the mooncakes and mooncake molds to prevent hand and mold from stickiness.

Place all mooncakes on a clean tray, then seal with plastic wrap and freeze over 1 hour inside your fridge. Take out 1 piece of baking paper, cut it into small square sheets, place on the bottom of each mooncake, and then put mooncakes in the Airfryer basket. Start the device with indicated temperature and time. Tip: With compatible double layer accessory for Airfryer XXL, you can prepare 12 mooncakes per time.
Pull open the Airfryer, brush mooncakes with sugar water  (mix sugar and water by ratio 1: 1), and continue baking for 1 minute.
Take out well baked mooncakes from Airfryer frying basket, and enjoy the delicious matcha and red bean mooncakes! Tip: Cool down for 5 mins after dishing up to have the best taste.

name: Cheesy zucchini tots
description:
These zucchini fritters are a quick snack, ideally to be made with the firm small zucchinis you can find in summer.

Tip: Using the grill pan works best, in the basket the tots might stick to the grid.
author: wouter.veldman_1@philips.com

steps.description: Grate the zucchini, for example with a kitchen machine. Squeeze out excess water from the zucchini. Grate the cheese. Mix the grated zucchini in a bowl with the grated cheese, egg, bread crumbs, salt and pepper.
Scoop table spoons full of the mixture on the grill pan and fry at the indicated temperature and time until they are nice and slightly golden.

name: Popeye Oyster
description:
Recipe courtesy of Let’s FRY in the Air by Dable Kwan.

Dable's Tip:
You can always use other shellfish, e.g. mussels. It is also easy to change the taste and texture by adding shredded cheese, breadcrumbs, etc.
author: nikola.kulmitzer@philips.com

steps.description: Open oysters and put aside.

Mix chopped spinach, chopped garlic, diced red bell pepper and melted butter.
Top each oyster with a scoop of the mixed ingredients. Add a dash of black pepper.

Place oysters into the basket and slide the basket into the Airfryer. Start the device with the indicated time and temperature.

The temperature in the basket is high, so remember to use tongs to take food out!
Serve hot!

name: Vegetarian Calzone
description:
You can vary with other vegetables. Optionally you could add a tomato sauce, we only use fresh tomato in this recipe. Let us know your calzone version?

Tip: The recipe does not include the pizza dough preparation. To save time, you can use store-bought pizza dough.
author: wouter.veldman_1@philips.com

steps.description: Finely chop the fennel and carrot, discard ends. Chop the mushroom into small cubes. Add the chopped ingredients into the baking accessory with olive oil, the dried herbs, pepper and salt, stir together.
Place the baking accessory into the basket of the Airfryer and fry the vegetables at the indicated temperature. Stir half way the cooking process.
Meanwhile, cut the tomato into small pieces. Grate the cheese. Wash and remove the oregano leaves from the stalks.

Place a round shaped pieces of pizza  dough on a worktop dusted with flour. Cover one halve of the dough with the fried ingredients. Leave some space at the edges. Place tomato, oregano and grated cheese on top.
Flip the dough to cover the filling, fold the edges and press them together.
Brush the calzone with olive oil.

Place the calzone in the basket of the Airfyrer and bake at the indicated temperature and time until the dough is cooked through and golden. 

Tip: You can also use the new XXL pizza accessory, you could even fit 2 calzones at once.
Butter the Philips Airfryer baking accessory.
Cream the butter with the light brown sugar. Mix in honey. Add the egg and mix for 3 minutes.
Mash the bananas. Sift the spelt flour. Fold in the mashed bananas, the cinnamon, the baking powder and salt. Spoon into the baking accessory. Garnish the top with the sliced banana.
Bake in the Airfryer, until golden. Let cool in the pan for 20 minutes, then remove from baking accessory.

name: Thai coconut shrimp with rice vermicelli
description: A noodle dish in the Airfryer? After roasting marinated shrimp, the thin rice vermicelli cooks ready in the coconut sauce, while all the flavours get mixed in this meal.
author: luc.swaan@philips.com

steps.description: Peal and finely chop garlic. Halve the chili pepper lengthways, discard the seeds and finely chop it.
Cut rice vermicelli into 5 cm pieces. Cook the vermicelli in a pan of water on the stove, cool under running water and leave to drain.
Mix the shrimp with garlic oil. Put them in the baking accessory, place it in the basket of the Airfryer and roast the shrimp at the indicated temperature and time.
When the appliance is ready, open the Airfryer, add chopped garlic, bimi, lemongrass, ginger and curry powder and continue to fry at the indicated temperature and time.
Finally, add the cooked vermicelli, pour in coconut milk, stir and continue to fry at the indicated temperature and time.

name: Pulled chicken sandwich with cheddar and lambs lettuce
description:
You can prepare pulled chicken in advance and store it in the fridge for later use.
This way, whenever you feel like it, you can enjoy a delicious pulled chicken sandwich in no time.
author: darko.kontin@infinum.hr

steps.description:
Place the chicken breast on a sheet of aluminum foil.
Season with olive oil and salt.
Wrap the chicken breast tightly in foil and place it in the basket.

Put the basket into the Airfryer.
Start the device with the indicated time and temperature settings.

Wait a couple of minutes for baked chicken breast to cool down and then remove from foil.
Tip: Watch out for excess liquid in the foil from the chicken breast.

Using two forks, shred the chicken breast piece by piece until the entire breast is pulled apart into strips.
Repeat this step with the rest of the meat.

Cut the buns in half.
Top the bottom half of a bun with washed lamb's lettuce. Top it up with pulled chicken and some grated cheddar cheese. Finish everything with some tomato ketchup.
Put the other half of the bun on top and fix the sandwich with a wooden skewer.

name: Asparagus and Gorgonzola Gratin
description:
This side dish is made from only a few simple ingredients but is sure to make your meal far more memorable.

Tip: This recipe will cook medium-thickness asparagus crisp-tender. For thicker asparagus, or if you prefer your asparagus fully-tender, increase the cook time to 8 minutes.
author: partner.mona.dolgov@philips.com

steps.description: Trim at least 2 inches from the stalk-ends of the asparagus and discard. Transfer the trimmed spears to the baking accessory basket.
Top asparagus spears with olive oil, garlic, lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Toss to fully coat the asparagus and then spread out in an even layer. Top with the crumbled gorgonzola cheese.
Place  the baking accessory into the Airfryer basket. Start the device with the indicated time and temperature.
Serve topped with fresh lemon zest.

name: Pumpkin Fries with Yogurt Dip
description: Tip: You can serve the pumpkin fries with yogurt dip as a snack or a side dish.
author: mirta.stipanicev@philips.com

steps.description: For the pumpkin fries, first wash the pumpkin, cut open and remove the seeds (red kuri squash does not have to be peeled, other pumpkin varieties do). Cut into thick sticks. Coat with oil, sprinkle with curry powder or seasoning salt on each side.
Place the sticks in the basket of the Airfryer and bake at the indicated time and temperature until crispy.
In the meantime, stir the pressed garlic, salt, and pepper into the yogurt for the dip.
Serve the pumpkin fries with the yogurt dip.

Place the whole Cornish hen on cutting board. Set the Cornish hen upright with the back of the hen facing you.  Using a boning knife or a chef’s knife, start cutting from the top of the back bone to the bottom of the back bone. Make 2 cuts and remove the back bone.
Once the back bone is removed split the hen lengthwise cutting through the breastplate. Now you have 2 whole halves of Cornish hens, set aside.
In a mixing bowl combine all ingredients for the marinade including the Cornish hens.  Refrigerate for 1 hour up to 24 hours.
Transfer the Cornish hens to a fine mesh strainer to drain off any additional liquid.
Set the time and temperature as indicated.
Serve roasted cornish game hen.

name: Eggless cocoa brownie cake
description: Are you searching for something eggless, without any leavening agents, and yet very tasty? We have a perfect recipe for you.
author: vedran.boskovic@philips.com

steps.description: In a medium-sized bowl, combine the yoghurt, all-purpose flour, sugar, vegetable oil, and cocoa powder. Using an electric mixer, mix all the ingredients into a smooth batter.
Grease the baking accessory with some oil and dust it with flour. Pour in the brownie batter and bake at the indicated temperature for the recommended time.
Leave the brownie to cool down for at least ten minutes before serving. Cut the brownie cake into 4 pieces and serve with a little bit of cocoa dusted on top.

name: Fish pie with sweet potato
description:
The sweet potatoes make this comfort dish even more satisfying to eat.

Tip: Any fish filet would be suitable, use the one that is in season. 

Tip: Soaking the sweet potato 30 minutes in water before roasting improves the crispiness. Because we mash them this time, it is not really needed.
author: wouter.veldman_1@philips.com

steps.description: Peel the sweet potatoes, cut in 3cm thick pieces, coat with olive oil.
Place the sweet potato pieces in the basket and bake with the indicated temperature and time.
Cut the leek lengthways, wash and chop into 1cm halve rings. Peel the shallot and finely chop. Finely chop the celery. Gently remove the dill leafs from the stalks and finely chop both parts.

Place a saucepan on the stove on medium heat. Add butter, chopped leek, shallot, celery and the dill stalks. Fry for 5 minutes until the vegetables are soft. Stir in the flour and stock powder and continue to heat for 1 minute. Pour in the water and stir for a minute to make a sauce. Turn off the heat.

Mash the baked sweet potato with 1 tbsp. olive oil and a pinch of salt and pepper. Cut the fish into 3cm pieces and add into the sauce. Add the dill tops. Scoop the sauce with the fish into the baking accessory,  Scoop the sweet potato puree over the sauce in the baking accessory.
Place the baking accessory into the Airfryer basket and bake at the indicated temperature and time.

name: Italian Meatballs
description: Our traditional Italian meatballs are easy to prepare and can be fried to perfection in our Airfryer. Pair these delicious meatballs with spaghetti for a fun family dinner night.
author: verena.ratz@philips.com

steps.description: Place the bread in a medium-sized bowl. Cover with milk. Set aside to soak until soggy.
Crack one egg in a small bowl. Add additional yolk to egg bowl.

Finely chop the parsley. Mince onion and garlic. Combine all ingredients in a large bowl. Squeeze liquid from bread and add to meatball mixture. Mix well with hands. Form meat into 12-3 ounce balls. Brush top of meatballs with olive oil.

Add meatballs and rosemary sprigs to the Airfryer basket. Cook at the time and temperature indicated below.

Tip: cook in batches for best results or insert the Philips Double Layer Rack, cooking 6 meatballs on top and 6 on bottom.
Got buns? Serve these up as sliders.

name: Donatella's Heart Healthy Nut and Herb Encrusted Salmon
description: Salmon comes out perfectly in the Airfryer....the addition of the pistachio and walnut crust adds a magical crunch and savoriness to this entire dish.
author: partner.mona.dolgov@philips.com

steps.description: Rinse salmon and pat dry. In a small bowl, whisk together, 1 teaspoon olive oil, mustard, lemon juice, 1 teaspoon of agave, salt and pepper and rub evenly on top and sides of salmon.

In a small food processor, combine nuts, thyme, rosemary, red  pepper flakes, garlic, remaining 1 teaspoon extra virgin olive oil and lemon zest. Pulse until coarsely ground. Spread the mixture evenly over the salmon and press lightly to create a crust.
Cut the whole lemon into quarters. Rub each wedge with remaining agave nectar and a pinch of crushed red pepper.
Place the salmon and lemon wedges in the Airfryer basket. Start the device with the indicated time and temperature.

name: Coconut prawns
description: By adding flaked coconut to the bread crumbs, this dish is not only going to be tasty, but also exotic. Serve these prawns with your favorite sweet and sour and tomato sauces.
author: darko.kontin@infinum.hr

steps.description: Place a slice of bread in a food processor to prepare homemade bread crumbs. Prepare one bowl with the flour and one with the beaten egg. Combine the bread crumbs with coconut shred in a third bowl.
Coat the prawns with flour, dip in the beaten egg and then coat with the bread crumb and coconut mixture. Repeat these steps until there are no more prawns left.

Place the breaded coconut prawns in the basket of the Airfryer, leaving enough space for the double layer accessory. Place the rest of the prawns on the double layer accessory and put the accessory in the basket of the Airfryer. Start the device with the indicated time and temperature.
Serve coconut prawns warm with sweet and sour sauce or some other sauce you prefer.

name: Roasted Brussel sprouts and chestnuts with sage
description:
This autumn side dish shows a different way to prepare Brussel sprouts; roasting them makes them taste much better!

Tip: For a complete meal, you could roast the sprouts together with 2x2 cm potato cubes, they need about the same time.
author: wouter.veldman_1@philips.com

steps.description: Cut a small piece from the stem of the sprouts and cut a cross into the stem.
Wash the sprouts, dry in a cloth and mix them with some olive oil in a bowl.
Add the sprouts into the basket of the Airfryer and fry them at the indicated temperature and time.

Mix the chestnuts and the bunch of sage with oil. Add the chestnuts and sage to the sprouts in the basket of the Airfryer and continue to roast at the indicated temperature and time.  

Tip: The sage is fried in a bunch, so that the leafs cannot fly to the heating element.
Mix lemon juice with olive oil and pepper to make a dressing. When the Airfryer is ready, finely chop the fried sage leafs.
Serve the Brussel sprouts and chestnuts mixed with the dressing, chopped sage leafs and sprinkled with sea salt.

name: Lemon cake with dates
description:
January is coming and with the new year many people have good resolutions regarding a healthier eating habit and less refined (white) sugar consumption. Here comes a way how to reduce refined sugar intake without having to do without a juicy and tasty cake. We replace the sugar with dates to enjoy the natural sweet taste of ripe fruits.

Tip: We used very soft dates here. If yours are not you can soak them in hot water for 10 minutes to soften them up.

Tip: You can decide to skip the coconut syrup in step 3, if you want to further reduce the amount of sugar in this recipe.
author: wouter.veldman_1@philips.com

steps.description: Ground the almonds with a food processor. Then mix the dates with the food processor until they are sticky.

In a bowl mix the eggs with sunflower oil using an electric whisk. Then add the date pulp, grounded almonds, spelt flour, lemon zest, freshly squeezed lemon juice, pinch of salt and baking soda and mix to a smooth dough.
Add the coconut syrup to the dough and fill it into the baking accessory of the Airfryer.
Place the baking accessory into the basket of the Airfryer and bake at the indicated temperature and time.
Marinate the drumsticks with soy sauce for 30 minutes.
Coat drumsticks with flour, beaten eggs, corn bread crumb, put in the basket. Slide basket into the Airfryer. Start the device with the indicated time and temperature.
Mash the pear and garlic cloves, bring all seasonings to a boil and set aside.
When bake through, remove from the Airfryer and drizzle with dip sauce, set to a plate, garnish by putting a sprinkle of sesame and minced green onion.
Melt the chocolate and butter together in a thick-bottom steel pan on low heat while stirring. Then allow the mixture to cool to room temperature.
Beat the egg with the sugar, the vanilla sugar and a pinch of salt in a bowl, until it have a light and creamy texture.
Beat in the chocolate mixture.
Mix the flour, the baking powder and the chopped walnuts and stir it thoroughly to the chocolate mixture.

Butter the baking tray. Spread the batter in the baking tray and smooth on top. Place the baking tray in the basket and slide the basket into the Airfryer. Start the device with the indicated time and temperature.

Serve your Brownies!  
Tip: Let the brownies cool in the baking tray. When cool, cut it into pieces.

name: Chicken Breast with Grilled Vegetables
description: Tip: The chicken breast can also be served with fried potatoes. You can also garnish it with green pesto according to taste.
author: kathrin.olipitz_1@philips.com

steps.description: First, clean the chicken breasts, season with salt and pepper.
Place the chicken breasts in the basket of the Airfryer (skin side down, if skin on) and fry at the indicated time and temperature.

Peel the onion and cut into slices. Wash the zucchini, cut in half lengthwise and remove the seeds. Cut in half widthways and cut into thin sticks. Core the bell pepper and cut it into thin strips. Cut the tomatoes in half. Peel the garlic and cut into thin slices. Pluck the thyme leaves and finely chop them.
Mix the vegetables with oil and season them with thyme, salt, and pepper. Then, place them on the chicken breasts in the basket of the Airfryer. Cook it all at the indicated time and temperature.
Arrange the chicken breasts on top of the grilled vegetables and serve.

name: Mediterranean bread with tomatoes and olives
description: Have a freshly baked bread with sun-dried tomatoes, olives, and Mediterranean herbs in no time.
author: darko.kontin@infinum.hr

steps.description: Put the flour on the kitchen counter. Add the dried yeast, salt, thyme, oregano, and chives to the flour. Mix all the ingredients together by hand and make a small well in the middle of the flour.

Cut the black olives and sun-dried tomatoes into small pieces. Add them to the flour.
Pour the olive oil and lukewarm water in the middle of the flour.

Knead the bread dough with your hands until it is elastic and sticky. If necessary, you can add a little extra flour so the dough does not stick to your hands. Once the dough is ready, put it in the Philips baking accessory and cover with a kitchen towel. Leave the dough in a warm place to rise for 75 minutes or until it doubles in size. Once the bread dough has risen, add the baking accessory to the basket.
Put the basket in the Airfryer. Start the device at the indicated temperature and time.
Carefully remove the bread from the baking accessory and wrap it in a kitchen towel. Leave the bread in the towel to cool down before serving.

name: Carrot and Cheese Snack Balls
description: Are you looking for a healthier TV snack ? Perfect! Here come crispy and savory snack balls with hidden carrots! They will easily become your favorite snack and also fit perfectly into your children’s lunch box for school.
author: verena.ratz@philips.com

steps.description: Peel the carrots and grate them using a vegetable grater.
In a bowl mix the grated carrots with sesame seeds, spelt flour, mustard, smooth margarine, egg, salt and pepper using your hands.
Add the grated gouda cheese, mix thoroughly once again. Then form the carrot-cheese-dough into balls using your hands.
Place the balls into the basket of the Airfryer and bake at the indicated temperature and time until crispy.

name: Roast potatoes with green sauce
description:
A simple variation on roast potatoes. 

Tip: Depending on the season you need to peel the potatoes. 

Tip: A hand blender is used to prepare the sauce
author: wouter.veldman_1@philips.com

steps.description: Wash and cut the potatoes into even pieces, about 3-4 cm. Add them in a bowl with olive oil and stir to coat the pieces with oil.
Add the potato into the basket of the Airfryer and roast the potatoes ready at the indicated temperature and time – Shake the basket halve way through the cooking process.
Meanwhile add the herbs, mustard, apple vinegar, oil, pepper and salt to a narrow jar and use a hand blender to process into a sauce.
Serve the roast potato, drizzled with the green sauce.
Chop the fennel, peppers, courgette and red onion into small blocks. Chop the dill very finely and mix it with the oil and vegetables.

Clean the Redfish by cutting it from below, remove the innards and rinse it thoroughly. It is quite normal for a redfish not to smell fresh which is why you must rinse it thoroughly or let the fishmonger do this for you. Sprinkle the cleaned redfish with salt and fill it with the finely chopped vegetable mixture.
Chop the lemon through the centre. Cover the bottom of the Philips grill pan with the remaining vegetables and place the Redfish on it.
Put the Redfish on the grill pan together with the lemons in the Airfryer pan. Slide it into the Airfryer and start the device with the indicated time an temperature.
Garnish with fresh dill and sprinkle with lemon.

name: Swedish Meatballs
description: These Swedish Meatballs make a great party appetizer exactly as they are, but are also a great family meal when served over mashed potatoes or buttered egg noodles, with a side salad.
author: partner.mona.dolgov@philips.com

steps.description: In a large bowl, combine ground beef, egg, breadcrumbs, onion, parsley, salt, pepper, and nutmeg to create the meatball mix.
Form the meatballs into golf ball-sized balls and transfer to the Airfryer basket. You may need to stack the last few meatballs atop the first layer.

Start the device with the indicated time and temperature, flipping meatballs halfway through. For best results, check for doneness with a meat thermometer. Meatballs are done when the centers reach 160 °F.
As the meatballs are cooking, prepare the gravy by heating butter and flour in a saucepan over medium heat. Stir until combined and, stirring constantly, let simmer 2 minutes.

Stir in beef stock, mustard, onion powder, and thyme and bring up to a simmer. Let simmer 5 minutes to reduce the liquid by about 1/4. Remove from heat, stir in heavy cream, and season with salt and pepper to taste.
Transfer meatballs to the finished gravy before serving topped with additional chopped parsley, if desired.
Halve the apricots and remove the stones. Cut them into cubes and place into a bowl. Add the blackberries, the sugar and the lemon juice and mix.
Scoop the fruit mixture into the baking accessory and spread it out.
In a bowl, mix the flour with a pinch of salt and the remaining sugar.  Add the butter and cold water and rub together with your fingertips until you have a crumbly mixture.
Distribute the crumbly mixture evenly over the fruit and lightly press down.
Put the baking accessory into the basket and slide the basket into the Airfryer. Start the device with the indicated time and temperature.
Serve your Apricot blackberry crumble!
Cut the cheddar into 5 equally-sized rectangular portions.
Take two pieces of bacon and wrap around each piece of cheddar, fully enclosing the cheese. Trim any excess fat.
Place in the freezer for 5 minutes to firm.  Do not freeze.
Mix breadcrumbs together with salt and olive oil. Gather the egg, flour and breadcrumbs and set aside in 3 separate bowls.
Remove cheddar blocks from the freezer.  One at a time, place into the flour, then the egg and finally the breadcrumbs.
Place the croquettes in the Airfryer and set the time and temperature as indicated.
Serve the croquettes.

name: Filled apples with almonds
description: Tip: soak the raisins in a bit of Calvados first.
author: luc.swaan@philips.com

steps.description: Wash the apples and remove the cores. Grind the almonds in a kitchen machine. Add the raisins and the sugar and turn the kitchen machine on for another 30 seconds.

Fill up the apples with the mixture of raisins and almonds and put them in the Airfryer basket. Make sure to press the filling tight into the apples to make sure it doesn't leak from the apples when they're in the Airfryer.
Put the basket in the Airfryer and bake the filled apples with the time and temperature indicated below.

Make the vanilla sauce in the meantime. Heat up the whipped cream together with the sugar and the marrow of the vanilla bean for 2-3 minutes. Dissolve the sugar by stirring the mixture. Let the sauce cool off after the sugar has dissolved.
Serve the apples on plates with some vanilla sauce.

name: Snack bread with garlic and parsley
description:
When neighbors or friends unexpectedly come over for drinks. Or when Sunday afternoon calls for a quick and easy snack: easily make this with the Airfryer.

Tip: Ready-to-bake bread or little baguettes are also suitable for making snack bread. You will have to adjust the baking time to 5 minutes in total.
author: luc.swaan@philips.com

steps.description: Slice the bread 4 times crosswise, but not fully through.

Let the butter come to room temperature in a  bowl. Finely chop the parsley. Peel and finely cut the garlic. Grate the lemon zest over the butter. Mix in the chopped parsley and garlic with a fork. Season with salt and freshly ground pepper. With a knife, spread the butter mixture between the notches in the bread.
Place the bread in the Airfryer basket and start the device with the indicated time and temperature. Bake until the bread is crispy and the butter has melted.
Serve the snack bread on a large plate to share.

Peel and cut the potatoes and parsnips in equal pieces. Put the potatoes and parsnips in the pan and pour water with some salt in the pan. The ingredients should be completely covered by water. Cook for 25 minutes. Drain the vegetables and mash with milk into a puree. Mix the sauerkraut into the puree.
Peel the apples and cut them into 1 centimeter cubes. Mix the apple cubes with mustard, butter and cinnamon. Place the apple cubes in the baking accessory, and fry them until golden and soft.
Spoon the potato puree with sauerkraut over baked apple cubes in the baking accessory.
Chop the pecans. Cut the butter for the crumble into pieces and knead with the pecans, rolled oats, flour and a pinch of salt to a crumbly dough. Spread the crumble over the mash.
Put the baking accessory in the Airfryer and bake the crumble golden brown and warm.
Serve the Sauerkraut crumble from the baking accessory.

name: Roast cod with butter and lemon
description: It is an exquisite delicacy that embellishes your exquisite life. This recipe is white, fresh and nutritious, which is absolutely suitable for people living an exquisite life.
author: yudan.chang@philips.com

steps.description: Cut the silver cod into even pieces and put them into a container. Then add basil, salt, grounded black pepper and olive oil, squeezed lemon juice, and mix gently with the cod.

Place the cod on the Airfryer grilling accessory (with the skin facing down). Put the butter on the fish, and the butter can be fully integrated into the fish during the baking process. Slide the Airfryer grilling accessory into the Airfryer. Start the device with the indicated time and temperature:
Take out and serve on a platter. Enjoy the delicious cod with lemon and butter flavor!

name: Poached Eggs
description:
Did you know you can easily prepare eggs in the Airfryer? The method we show here uses the muffin forms. You can even top them with cheese and herbs. 

Tip: The time always depends a bit on the size and temperature of the eggs. Our eggs were done with the yolks still soft with the setting in this recipe.
author: verena.ratz@philips.com

steps.description: Crack the eggs above the muffin cups. Optionally top with cheese or herbs.
Carefully place the muffin cups into the basket of the Airfryer and start at the indicated temperature and time.
Confirm if the egg is fully done or cook a few minutes longer. You can also leave the eggs in the Aifryer and use the residual heat until they are ready to serve.

name: Breaded button mushrooms with rocket and tomato salad
description: Mushrooms are a popular ingredient loved by many. But have you ever thought about a mushroom as a crunchy element on your plate? If not, this dish might change your mind.
author: darko.kontin@infinum.hr

steps.description: Clean and wipe of any dirt from the mushrooms.

Prepare one bowl with flour, one with the beaten egg seasoned with salt and black pepper, and one with bread crumbs.
Tip: Add a little bit of oil into the bread crumbs if you would like to get a crispier crust on the mushrooms.

Take a mushroom and coat it with flour, dip in the beaten egg and, in the end, coat it with bread crumbs.
Repeat these steps with the rest of the mushrooms.

Put the mushrooms in the basket, and place the basket in the Airfryer.
Start the device with the indicated time and temperature.
Serve the mushrooms with rocket leaves and cherry tomatoes.

name: Parmesan Potato Cakes with Parsley
description: Transform leftover potato mash into a great side or on-the-go snack.
author: verena.ratz@philips.com

steps.description:
Use leftover cooked potatoes or boil potatoes in water on the stove. 
Grate the Parmesan cheese. Finely chop the parsley.
Drain boiled potato and mash with a potato masher together with the egg, grated Parmesan, flour, chopped parsley, olive oil, salt and pepper.

Form discs with your hands and brush the outside with olive oil.

Tip: It helps to make your hands wet with water, so that the mash does not stick to them.

Place the discs into the basket of the Airfryer and bake them ready at the indicated temperature and time. 

Tip: You can use the grill pan accessory for this recipe. Preheating the pan will give the best results, 5 minutes at 400 degrees.

name: Mini Empanadas
description: Mini Empanadas with Chorizo
author: nikola.kulmitzer@philips.com

steps.description: Stir the chorizo with the shallot and bell pepper in a skillet and fry on low heat for 2 to 3 minutes until the bell pepper is tender.  Take off the heat and stir in the parsley.  Allow the mixture to cool.
Use a glass to cut twenty 5 cm rounds from the dough. Scoop a spoonful of the chorizo mixture on each round.  Press the edges together between thumb and index finger, creating a scallop pattern.
Put the empanadas in the basket and slide the basket into the Airfryer. Start the device with the indicated time and temperature. Cook in two batches for optimal results.
Serve the empanadas lukewarm.

name: Cassoulet with chicken
description: Airfryer provides a new way to make a traditional meal. Cassoulet is a nutritional, slow-cooked casserole originating in the south of France, containing meat, pork and white beans. The dish is named after its traditional earthenware cooking pot, the cassole.
author: luc.swaan@philips.com

steps.description: Peel and chop the onion. Peel the garlic and cut fine. Peel the leaves of the tarragon. Halve the mushrooms. Cut the zucchini into equal pieces.

Add the onion and garlic with the diced bacon, the mushrooms and courgette to the Philips baking accessory. Put the accessory in the Airfryer and start the indicated time and temperature and cook until the bacon begins to color and the vegetables are cooked.
Remove the baking accessory from the Airfryer. Drain the white beans and rinse. Stir in the white beans and the tarragon with the vegetables. Season with freshly ground pepper. Set aside until use.

In a bowl, mix the chicken with chilli powder and pepper. Place the chicken thighs in the Airfryer basket. Start the device with the indicated time and temperature. Please note, the chicken does not have to be entirely cooked at this stage.

Remove the chicken from the basket. Grate the cheese and mix in a bowl with the bread crumbs. Stir the chicken into the cassoulet and cover with the cheese mixture. Put the baking accessory with the cassoulet back into the Airfryer. Bake in the Airfryer with the indicated time and temperature until golden and crispy.
Sprinkle the cassoulet with the rest of the tarragon and serve with e.g. rice or French bread.

name: Blueberry oat cookies with almonds - only natural sugars
description:
These cookies are perfect for everyone who wants to restrict using added sugar in food. Easy to bake with a crispy and natural taste.

Tip: If the cookies taste too healthy for you, add a tbsp of raw cane sugar next time you bake them.
Tip: If you are vegan, make sure the margarine is 100% plant-based
author: wouter.veldman_1@philips.com

steps.description: Put plant-based margarine in an oven-safe dish or muffin cup and into the basket of the Airfryer and heat up at the indicated temperature and time until melted.
Mix rolled oats with almond flakes. Add blueberries, apple sauce, melted margarine and salt and mix it all together. Form seven cookies out of the dough and put them on the grill pan.

Place the grill pan in the Airfryer and bake the cookies at the indicated temperature and time. 

Tip: In case you do not have the grill pan accessory, you can also bake the cookies directly into the basket until they are nicely golden and crunchy.
If you can resist, leave the cookies to cool down on a rack for a while, until you eat them, this will improve the crunchiness!

name: Fast rhubarb pie
description:
Rhubarb is often used in sweet desserts and pastries, but it really is a vegetable. Rhubarb is packed with fibers and vitamin C. During spring the red stems and large green leaves emerge from the ground. Earlier in the season, greenhouse rhubarb is available. 

Tip: Serve this rhubarb pie for dessert with vanilla or strawberry ice cream.
author: sandra.pilkes@philips.com

steps.description:
Grease the baking accessory with butter and dust with flour. 
Sprinkle the work surface with flour and roll the dough to a 30 cm ø. Place the dough in the baking accessory and let the edge hang over. Sprinkle the bottom of the pie with corn starch.

Wash the rhubarb, cut of the leafs and ends and cut the stems into 3 cm pieces. Peel the apple, remove the core and cut the apple into cubes. Place the rhubarb and the apple at the bottom of the pastry.

Halve a vanilla bean lengthwise and scrape out the marrow with the back of a knife. Mix the vanilla marrow in a bowl with sugar and corn starch and sprinkle the mixture over the rhubarb.
Beat the egg in a bowl. Fold the dough back over the rhubarb and brush the edge with egg and sprinkle with sugar.
Place the baking accessory in the basket of the Airfryer. Bake the rhubarb pie in the Airfryer gold and crunchy at the indicated temperature and time.
Sprinkle the cake with powdered sugar.

name: Grilled haloumi and vegetable salad
description:
Very simple but very tasty. Everyone who’s looking for an easy vegetarian side dish option will be super satisfied with this warm and aromatic haloumi and roasted vegetable salad. Served with some freshly squeezed lemon juice and mint it supports your body with lots of vitamins and creates good mood in just a moment. Enjoy your healthy food!

Tip: Works with carrots or pumpkin as well.
Tip: A regular sized can of chickpeas should have around 250g of chickpeas when the water is drained.
author: wouter.veldman_1@philips.com

steps.description: In a pan roast the almond flakes until they are golden and smell aromatically.

Wash the baby spinach leaves. Pour off the chickpeas. Cut the red paprika into stripes and the haloumi cheese into slices. Mix the red paprika stripes and haloumi slices with olive oil, salt and pepper and place them into the basket of the Airfryer.
Place the basket into the Airfryer and bake at the indicated temperature and time.
Peel the orange and fillet it.

Cut the spinach leaves into bite sized pieces. Arrange them on a plate together with the orange fillets. Add the roasted paprika stripes, roasted haloumi cheese, chickpeas and sprinkle with roasted almond flakes. Sprinkle the colourful salad with freshly squeezed lemon juice, olive oil and mint leaves.
Chop nuts and dried persimmon and mix well with honey.
Wash and parboil water celeries.
Put the honey-nut mixture in the middle of each filo pastry sheet, gather the edges in the shape of a pocket, and tie them with boiled water celeries
Put four biscuits in the basket and slide the basket into the Airfryer. Bake the honey walnut biscuits with the indicated time and temperature.
Serve your honey walnut biscuit!  Tip: Use raisins, dried blueberry, dried cranberry etc instead of dried persimmon.

Place shrimp, squid paste, sesame oil, Chinese wine, chicken seasoning mix and egg white into the Philips food processor or blender.  Blend until a coarse paste is formed, then transfer to a bowl.  Stir in the chopped water chestnuts, coriander, spring onion, water, garlic oil and pepper to taste.
Divide shrimp paste mixture equally into 10 portions and roll each into a ball. Dip the seafood balls in water and roll onto diced sandwich bread cubes.
Place seafood bread balls into the AirFryer basket and slide it into the AirFryer.  Start the device with the indicated time and temperature.
Turn the balls over.  Start the device with the indicated time and temperature.
Transfer to serving plate and serve immediately.

name: Fried deviled eggs
description:
Deviled eggs are a treat on their own, but frying them makes them even better by adding just the right amount of crunchiness.  
We went with our classic flavoring for this version, but they could easily be spiced up with other flavorings or garnishes.
author: vedran.boskovic@philips.com

steps.description: Boil six eggs in boiling water for 8 minutes. Let them cool down and then peel them.
Cut the eggs in half lengthwise. Remove the yolks and place them in a bowl. Set the egg whites aside.

Place the flour on one plate and the breadcrumbs on another. In a small bowl, beat an egg with a fork. Coat the egg halves in flour and then dip them into the egg mixture–be sure to get the center of the egg where the yolk was. Move the eggs to the breadcrumbs and push the breadcrumbs onto all sides of the egg whites. Spray the breaded egg halves with oil cooking spray and move them to the Airfryer basket.
Start the device with the indicated time and temperature.
While the fried egg whites are cooling down, prepare the filling. Mash the yolks with a fork and stir in the Greek yoghurt, salt, pepper, chili powder, and lemon juice.
Using a piping bag, pipe the yolk mixture into the egg white halves. Serve with fresh radishes and chives.

name: Stuffed Portobello with roasted radicchio
description: The fleshy Portobello is an excellent meat replacement and together with the pine nuts this meal contains a good amount of protein.
author: wouter.veldman_1@philips.com

steps.description: Prepare potato mash by boiling the potatoes and mash them with butter and salt.
Roast the pine nuts in the Airfryer by putting them in the Airfryer basket and start the device with the indicated temperature and time.
Cut the apple into 2cm pieces and place into the Philips baking accessory with water, drizzle honey on top.
Place the baking accessory in the Airfryer basket and start the indicated temperature and time.

Meanwhile, finely chop half of the Parmesan cheese. Cut the rest of it in flakes and set aside.
With a spoon, scoop out the stem and part of the flesh from the inside of the Portobello. Chop this part roughly and mix with the finely chopped cheese, 2/3 of the roasted pine nuts, the dried thyme, freshly ground black pepper and olive oil. Fill the Portobello with the mixture.
Place the stuffed portobello in the basket of the Airfryer and start at the indicated temperature and time.

Meanwhile, cut the radicchio. Through the root into wedges. Put cheese flakes between the leafs and brush with olive oil. 
Chop the parsley.
Place radicchio pieces in the Airfryer basket and start the indicated temperature and time.
Serve the Portobello with the potato mash, radicchio and quick apple compote. Finish with the rest of the roasted pine nuts and parsley.

name: Cheesy Zucchini Tots
description:
These zucchini fritters are a quick snack, ideally to be made with firm small zucchinis.

Tip: Using the grill pan works best, in the basket the tots might stick to the grid.
author: verena.ratz@philips.com

steps.description: Grate the zucchini and squeeze out any excess water. Grate the cheese. Mix the grated zucchini in a bowl with the grated cheese, egg, bread crumbs, salt and pepper.
Scoop table spoons full of the mixture on the grill pan and fry at the indicated temperature and time until they are nice and slightly golden.
Cut the top of the mini peppers and remove the seeds and membrane.  Mix the olive oil in a deep dish with the Italian herbs and the pepper.  Toss the pieces of goat cheese in the oil.

Push a piece of goat cheese in each mini pepper and place the mini peppers next to each other in the basket. Slide the basket into the Airfryer. Start the device with the indicated  time and temperature.

Serve the mini peppers in small dishes as appetizers or snacks.  Tip: The same method can be used to fill vine tomatoes.  Hollow out the tomatoes first and leave them to drain upside down on kitchen paper.

name: Stuffed avocados with salmon and Mexican tostadas
author: luc.swaan@philips.com

steps.description: Start with the stuffed avocados by slicing the avocados in half and removing the pit. Place the salmon inside the avocado.
Crack and split the egg and collect half of the egg white. Pour the yolk into the hole in the avocado on top of the salmon, and sprinkle with salt and pepper.
Place the stuffed avocados in the basket of the Airfryer and grill them according to the time and temperature instructions.
After preparing, sprinkle the stuffed avocados with chopped dill and red beet leaves.
Now start making the tostadas. Finely chop the onion, garlic and red bell pepper, and chop the avocado into small pieces. Open the tins of corn, kidney beans and diced tomatoes and drain them.
Fry the ground meat in a pan with some oil and add the onion, garlic, beans, corn and diced tomatoes.

Meanwhile, spread a thin layer of sour cream on the pita breads. When the meat is cooked through, split it between the breads. Cover the breads with the meat filling and top off with cheese, salt and herbs.
Place the tostadas in the basket of your Airfryer and set it according to the instructions below. Bake the tostadas until they are ready.
Serve the tostadas together with the stuffed avocados.

name: Frittata with Goat cheese and Pesto Sauce
description: Baked frittata is a simple dish, but combine the eggs with some extra special ingredients, and a frittata can be built up to become a very special dish.
author: verena.ratz@philips.com

steps.description:
Peel and cut the red onion into half rings.
Cut the cherry tomatoes in quarters.

Beat eggs in a bowl.
Season to taste with salt and black pepper.
Add the red onions to the bowl with eggs and beat them together.

Grease the baking accessory with olive oil.
Pour in the egg and onion mixture.
Crumble the goat cheese on top of the eggs.
Add sliced cherry tomatoes and pesto on top of the eggs as well.
Place the baking accessory in the basket of the Airfryer and start the device at the indicated temperature and time.

name: Tawa Vegetables
description: Tip: You can try other vegetables like jackfruit and karela (bitter gourd) but the cooking time may vary.
author: nikola.kulmitzer@philips.com

steps.description: Remove the stalk and slit the eggplant into 4 from one side leaving them attached on the other corner. Similarly remove the stalk and slit the okra from one side leaving it attached on the other side. Peel and cut the potatoes and arbi into finger shape. Soak in water for 30 minutes. Rinse the cut potatoes and arbi under running water, drain them thoroughly and dry with a kitchen towel. Stuff masala into the okra and eggplant. Sprinkle the potato and arbi with the masala. Brush the vegetables with oil.

Place the vegetables in the Airfryer basket. Slide the basket into the Airfryer. Start the device with the indicated time and temperature. 
Note: The vegetables may cook at different times depending upon their size. Check the Airfryer a couple of times

name: Vegan gluten free pizza
description: This recipe includes the dough for a gluten-free pizza crust, the sauce and toppings are completely plant based.
author: wouter.veldman_1@philips.com

steps.description:
Mix water with yeast and sugar, stir and let stand for 5 minutes.
In a bowl, mix gluten free flour with salt, make a dent in the middle in which the yeast mixture is poured.
Stir together into a dough.
Let the dough stand in a warm place for 30 minutes.

Meanwhile, peel, halve and slice the onion into halve rings. Fry the onion in a pan on the stove with olive oil until soft and colored. Pour in the balsamic vinegar and remove the pan from the stove, leave to cool.
Prepare the sauce by mixing the plant-based yoghurt with plant-based cream, vinegar, olive oil, pepper and salt.

Prepare the “Parmesan cheese alternative” by grinding cashews with sesame seeds and salt.
Cut the sweet potato into thin strips. Halve the zucchini lengthways and chop them into small pieces.

Divide de dough into 1 piece per portion. For each pizza bottom, roll out the dough on a clean worktop, dusted with flour. Dust the dough on each side, this will prevent the dough from sticking.

Tip: Adjust the size of the pizza to your Airfryer basket.
Place one pizza bottom into the basket of the Airfryer, spread sauce on top, and cover with the garnish: sweet potato, zucchini, walnuts, onion chutney.
Bake the pizza in the Airfryer at the indicated temperature and time. Repeat this step for each pizza.
Serve the pizza sprinkled with “parmesan cheese alternative” and sea salt flakes.

name: Pesto Chicken Pizza
description:
The Airfryer gives this delicious Chicken Pesto Pizza a crispy, browned crust you would normally prepare in a wood-burning oven! The textures and flavors are amazing. 

Tip: Most grocery stores sell prepared pizza dough in refrigerated cases near the bakery or deli.
author: partner.mona.dolgov@philips.com

steps.description: Split the dough into 2 equal pieces. Using your hands, flatten and stretch each piece of dough until it is around an 8-inch diameter the size of the pizza tray. Spray the tray with olive oil spray before placing one of the stretched crusts onto it. Spray the top of the crust with additional olive oil spray.
Pierce the dough in 5 places with the tines of a fork to lessen air bubbles in the crust. Place pizza tray into Airfryer and start the device with the indicated time and temperature.
Spread 1/2 of the pesto over the partially-baked crust and top with 1/2 of the mozzarella cheese and 1/2 of the chicken. Continue cooking with the indicated time and temperature.
Toast the pine nuts in a dry skillet over medium heat for just 2–3 minutes, until lightly browned and fragrant.

Serve the cooked pizza topped with arugula and toasted pine nuts. You can use the ingredients in this recipe to prepare a second pizza or refrigerate the extra ingredients separately to prepare the next day.

Cut the fresh codfish in large chunks and pat dry. Mix ginger and garlic to a paste. In a bowl, mix with the ginger/garlic paste, cumin powder, red chili powder, a pinch salt, turmeric powder, ground coriander, the vinegar and the tomato puree.
Place fish in the mixture and marinate for 30 minutes.
Roll the marinated fish in breadcrumbs and brush with oil. Place fish in the Airfryer with double-layer accessory and bake with the indicated time and temperature.

name: Popped pumpkin seeds
description:
Pumpkin seeds are full of valuable nutrients and high in antioxidants. These seeds are linked to several health benefits and this is an easy recipe that makes them especially tasty.

Tip: Make sure to use the Snack Cover in this recipe.
author: wouter.veldman_1@philips.com

steps.description: Add pumpkin seeds to the basket of the Airfryer, insert the snack cover and roast them at the indicated temperature and time.
Season with sea salt flakes and enjoy as a snack or as a topping on for example a salad.
Peel and shred the potatoes. Bring salted water to a boil and blanch the shredded potatoes for for 5 minutes. Dry the cooled down potatoes thoroughly.
Mix grated onion and shredded potatoes together with melted butter and mixed herbs. Sprinkle with seasoned pepper and salt to taste.
Grease a shallow round foil tray that fits into the basket. Carefully fill in with potato mixture and press it gently down. Brush the top of rösti potato with some olive oil.
Slide the basket into the Airfryer. Start the device with the indicated time and temperature.
Gently and with the help of a palette knife, loosen the rösti around the edges and remove it.  Serve warm and garnish with a sprinkle of paprika powder (optional).

name: Cashew turkey breast with broccoli
description: Three simple ingredients combined together for a bowl full of flavor.
author: vedran.boskovic@philips.com

steps.description: Cut the turkey breast into 2 cm cubes. Wash the broccoli and cut it into small florets using a knife. Mix together the turkey breast, broccoli, and cashew nuts in a bowl. Add freshly grated ginger root, soy sauce, sesame oil to the bowl and season with pepper. Transfer all the ingredients into the Airfryer basket.
Bake at the indicated temperature for the recommended time.
Serve warm over rice, couscous, or with some whole grain bread.

name: Fried breaded pickles
description: Ideally served with a cold beer or perhaps a Moscow mule.
author: verena.ratz@philips.com

steps.description: Slice the pickles and pat dry with a paper towel.
Put the corn starch in a bowl and mix with cayenne pepper. Whisk the egg in another bowl. In a third bowl, add the bread crumbs.
Coat the pickles one by one with corn starch, dip them into the egg and finally into the bread crumbs.
Put the pickles into the basket of the Airfryer and fry at the indicated temperature and time.
Serve the Pickles with your favorite dip sauce.

name: Chicken legs with Asian glaze
description: The sauce brushed on top of the chicken will caramelize and gives the chicken a nice sweet and sour taste.
author: wouter.veldman_1@philips.com

steps.description: In a pan on the stove, reduce the balsamic vinegar and soy sauce. Stir in the butter, hot sauce and honey. The result is a thick glaze.

Drizzle some olive oil on the bottom side of the chicken legs and place them into the basket of the Airfryer.
Brush the glaze on the top side of the chicken.

Start the appliance at the indicated temperature and time. 

Tip: Check regularly if the Airfryer is not smoking too much. Chicken contains a lot of fat and this can start to smoke in the bottom pan of the Airfryer. If smoking occurs, remove excessive fat from the pan and continue to fry.
Open the drawer of the Airfryer, brush another layer of the glaze on top. Sprinkle sesame seeds on top of the chicken. Continue to grill the chicken at the indicated temperature and time.

Meanwhile, finely chop the parsley.
When the chicken is ready, serve with parsley sprinkled on top.
For the dough, mix warm water (65°C) with flour and salt well and roll into a ball, add a few drop of olive oil and let it sit and rise for 1 hour.

For the filling, mix chopped kimchi, mashed ginger, minced spring onion, minced pork, rice wine and sesame oil and stir well. Seasoning with salt and pepper and set aside. Cut the dough into small balls, then flatten each one, place pork mixture in the central of each round, then fold and pull the edge up over the filling, brush with the beaten egg and set aside.
Put buns into the basket. Slide  basket into the Airfryer.  Start the device with the indicated time and temperature. Cook in several batches for optimal results.
Serve your Kimchi Pork Pan-fried Bun!

name: Roasted Asian Chicken Wings
description: Tip: Serve the chicken wings as a main course with stir-fried noodles and pak choi.
author: luc.swaan@philips.com

steps.description: Mix the minced garlic with the ginger, cumin and oil. Add the salt and pepper to taste. Rub the chicken wings with the mixture.
Put the chicken wings in the basket and slide it into the Airfryer. Start the device with the indicated time and temperature.
Serve the chicken wings with the chili sauce as a main course or a snack.

name: Mecklenburg Potato Bacon Stew
description: Recipe by Guido Weber
author: kathrin.olipitz_1@philips.com

steps.description: Soak prunes in water for 1 hour, then drain them in a strainer and save the fluid. Brown the diced shallots and the diced bacon in margarine in the baking accessory at the indicated time and temperature.
Deglaze with the broth and set the device to the indicated time and temperature.

Cut the peeled potatoes into 1-cm cubes and add to the broth, together with the coarsely diced carrots, bay leaves, and cloves. Quarter the prunes, and with 100 ml of the soaking water and sugar, add to the remaining ingredients, cover with aluminum, and continue to cook at the indicated time and temperature.
Season to taste with salt, pepper, lemon juice, and optionally, cinnamon.

name: Thuringian Bratwurst Wrapped in Bacon
description:
Recipe by Guido Weber

Tip: This recipe pairs perfectly with a potato cheesecake. The recipe for this cheesecake can be found here in the app.
author: nikola.kulmitzer@philips.com

steps.description: Roll each bratwurst in a strip of bacon, then cut into four equal pieces and lay them in the basket of the Airfryer.
Serve the Thuringian sausage rolls hot with strong mustard.

name: Honey Roasted Parsnips
description: An easy to make side dish
author: verena.ratz@philips.com

steps.description: Cut off the ends of the parsnip, halve larger parsnips lengthways. Adjust the pieces to fit the baking accessory. Tip: The compact baking accessory is smaller, you can adapt the size to fit.
Place parsnip pieces in a pan on the stove, cover with water and bring to the boil. Cook for 5 minutes and then drain.
Place the pieces of parsnip in the baking accessory, drizzle with olive oil and coat with flour. Drizzle honey on top.
Put the baking accessory into the basket of the Airfryer and roast the parsnip at the indicated temperature and time.
Turn the pieces of parsnip and sprinkle with thyme leaves. Continue to roast at the indicated temperature and time until golden.
Serve sprinkled with sea salt. Tip: You could drizzle some fresh orange or lemon juice on top.

name: Fried Pineapple
description: Fried Pineapple with Honey
author: nikola.kulmitzer@philips.com

steps.description: Cut the pineapple in half lengthways. Cut away the skin and deep crowns and remove the tough core.
Cut each half lengthways again into 4 wedges.
Mix honey and lime juice in a bowl.
Brush the pineapple sections with the mixture then put them in the Airfryer basket. Sprinkle coconut on top and slide the basket into the Airfryer. Bake with the indicated time and temperature.
Tip: Serve the pineapple sections on plates with a generous scoop of ice cream or sorbet.

name: Grilled Avocado with Roasted Chickpeas
description: Tip: Instead of garam masala, try any curry spice mix such as an Indian madras spice mix
author: verena.ratz@philips.com

steps.description: Drain the chickpeas and dry them with a paper towel. Add them to a bowl and mix with olive oil and garam masala.
Add the chickpeas to the basket of the Airfryer and roast them at the indicated temperature and time.
Halve the avocado lengthways, discard the core. Brush the flesh with olive oil.
When the chickpeas are ready, remove them from the basket. Add the avocado and grill them in the basket at the indicated temperature and time.

Meanwhile, prepare the tahini sauce by mixing tahini with lukewarm water, lime juice and sea salt.
Finely chop the parsley.
Serve the grilled avocado halves with chickpeas on top, drizzled with tahini sauce and fresh parsley.

name: Choco Lava Cake
description: Tip: You can use cocoa powder as a substitute of chocolate. You can also put a piece of chocolate in the centre.
author: nikola.kulmitzer@philips.com

steps.description: Add the baking powder to the refined flour. Pass them through a sieve and keep aside.
Melt the chocolate chunks in a double boiler over low heat with continuous stirring. Add milk to the mixture and blend it well. Remove the melted chocolate from the gas, add butter and stir it well.
In a separate bowl break the egg, add powdered sugar and beat them until a creamy consistency is reached.
Blend the egg and sugar mixture into melted chocolate. Add the refined flour little by little to avoid lumps. Mix the batter well.
Grease the muffin cups with butter and dust them with some refined flour. Put 1 tablespoon of dough in each muffin cup.
Place the muffin cups into the basket. Slide the basket into the Airfryer. Start the device with the indicated time and temperature.
